Product Description:
The Dometic FanTastic Vent 2250

The Dometic FanTastic Roof Vent 2250 is a smart cookie!

Set speeds manually or automatically

You'll end up exactly where you want to be with your airflow. Just simply flip the reverse switch & the fan changes direction, drawing air in or out of your caravan or motor home. There’s a rain sensor that automatically closes the dome when it's wet keeping the inside of your leisure vehicle dry! The dome automatically opens once the rain stops.  Alternatively, you can control the dome by switch. The Dometic Fantastic Vent has a built-in thermostat keeping your interior at the perfect temperature.

Features:

  • 3-speed fan (low, medium, high)
  • Fits standard sizes
  • Built-in thermostat
  • Manual lift dome
  • High profile base
  • Reversible air flow
  • Installation Manual, Installation Materials

Fresh Air

The Dometic FanTastic Vent 2250 has three speeds (low, medium, high), a reverse switch that changes the fan blade direction from OUT to IN, a manual dome lifting knob & a built-in thermostat.  It’s perfect for use at bedtime or if you leave pets alone.

Roof vent with white dome

  • 350 x 350 mm
  • Input voltage 12 V (DC)

Dimensions

  • depth 419.10 mm
  • height 241 mm
  • width 419.10 mm

Product Description:
Thetford K1520 Motor Home Cooker

Introducing the new K1520 RV Cooker from Thetford!

Fan assisted oven

The K1520 is the first Motor Home gas fan assisted oven in Europe.  Ensuring air recirculation for efficient and equal temperature spread aiding faster cooking. The oven heat up time is also an improvement taking the temperature from 20°C to 200ËšC in approximately 6 mins.

The choice is yours, gas or dual fuel

The Thetford K1520 comes either as all gas with 4 rings, or as a dual fuel with 3 gas rings and a 1000 watt electric hotplate. The hotplate has a diameter of 145 mm.

Larger grilling area

The new K1520 cooker has an increased grilling area, no need to keep turning food so cooking time is reduced, for your convenience!

Lightweight

The Thetford K1520 is lightweight being approximately 10% lighter than similar cookers in the motorhome marketplace.

Specifications:

  • Grill pan kit
  • 2 Oven shelves
  • Fuel gas or dual fuel version (gas and electric)
  • Gas burners 1 x 1kW & 3 x 1.6kW (dual fuel version has 1 x 1kW, 2 x 1.6kW & 1 x Electric hotplate 1kw)
  • Grill burner1.8 kW
  • Grill capacity 19 L
  • Ignition 12V dc
  • Knobs Brushed nickel

 Watch the video

  • Please ensure you have correctly measured the oven before purchasing and re-stock fees can apply if an oven has been opened

Product Name: Avtex Tourer 2 Sat Nav Caravan Club Edition
Product Description:
Avtex Tourer 2 Sat Nav Caravan and Motor home Club Edition

First Class Touring Navigation.

This exciting collaboration between Avtex, and leading Sat-Nav manufactures Garmin, has produced a world class leisure touring Sat Nav aid, endorsed by the Caravan and Motorhome club.

Caravan and Motorhome Specific.

The Avtex Tourer 2 comes loaded with features specifically for use with Campervans, Caravans and Motor homes, and being the Caravan and Motorhome Club Edition this unit has all the Caravan and Motorhome Club data allowing you to search for, filter, and view all the best Caravan and Motor home Club sites.

The Avtex Tourer 2 is designed to simplify navigation for Campervans, Motor homes and Caravans.

Packed with customisable content.

The Avtex Tourer 2 comes preloaded with detailed maps of 45 European Countries, with free lifetime map updates, including information on road restrictions, such as bridge heights. 

Just input the specs of your Campervans, Motorhome or Caravan, and the Avtex Tourer Two will use your Campervans profile to find the most efficient route across the UK and Europe.

Your route will be determined based on the height, weight, length and width of your vehicle.

Hands Free Features With Voice Command Function.

Sync your Bluetooth enabled Smartphone to the Avtex Tourer 2, and get great features that let you stay connected without taking your hands off the wheel.

Make hands-free phone calls, and receive smart notifications on your navigator’s display. This means you can see incoming calls, text messages and calendar reminders without having to reach for your phone. The Avtex Tourer 2 Sat-Nav also offers the convenience of voice-activated navigation.

Say “voice command,” and then simply command your navigator with your voice while your hands never have to leave the steering wheel.

Active Lane Guidance.

Active Lane Guidance (ALG) uses voice prompts and brightly coloured arrows to indicate the correct lane for your campervans route, and moves along with you to make sure you're in the right place at the right time, without any last-minute lane-swapping panic.

Garmin Live Digital traffic via DAB

With the included combination power cable/traffic receiver, your Avtex Tourer two offers free digital traffic information for the useful life of your Sat Nav. This is known as the Garmin Live Digital Traffic. No need to pair to a Smartphone, this traffic solution is ready right out of the box! Just plug your navigator into your campervans, or caravan power outlet to receive helpful traffic information and enjoy the adventure ahead.

Dimensions

  • Width 170mm x Height 99mm x Depth 14mm

Features.

  • Search & filter site data from Caravan and Motorhome Club, ACSI, NKC and Motor Home Facts Databases
  • Voice command/hands-free features include Bluetooth calling, smart notifications and voice-activated navigation
  • Wi-Fi built in for easy updating – no computer required.
  • Free digital traffic alerts
  • Route planning based on the size & weight of your caravan, motorhome or campervans set-up
  • Easily navigate complex interchanges with “spoken turn-by turn”directions and active lane guidance.
  • Covers 45 countries, with free lifetime map updates
  • Large 7"  Sat Nav screen
Product Warranty: 12 months
Product Availability: Order your Avtex Tourer 2 Sat Nav before mid-day for next working day shipping

Product Name: Renogy 160 Watt Flexible Solar Panels and Kits
Product Description:
Renogy 160 watt Solar Panels and MULTI Panel kits

The 160 watt flexible panels and MULTI kits from RENOGY are an ideal solution for keeping your leisure battery charged in your campervan, motorhome or caravan.

Choose from a standard 160 watt basic kit, or choose a 320 watt MPPT kit complete with all fixings required.

Flexibility

The Renogy 160 watt solar panels are the most flexible solar panels on the market, and can be flexed up to 248 degrees, which is very useful for curved motorhome or campervan rooves

Ultra Lightweight

The advanced polymer system employed by the RENOGY 160 watt solar means it is 70% lighter than campervan solar panels with comparable output.

Super Thin Lamination

Discreet and thin, the Renogy 160W Lightweight Solar Panel is only a tenth of an inch thick. Approximately 95% thinner than its rigid counterpart, this panel is ideal for an easy installation to your campervan, motorhome or caravan.

Highly Durable

Rigorously tested, the 160W panel is designed to withstand extreme wind of up to 2400Pa and snow loads of up to 5400Pa and has undergone extensive hail tests.

PWM Controller or MPPT?

The PWM controller is in essence a switch that connects a solar array to a battery.

The result is that the voltage of the array will be pulled down to near that of the battery.

The MPPT controller is more sophisticated (and more expensive): it will adjust its input voltage to harvest the maximum power from the solar array and then transform this power to supply the varying voltage requirement, of the campervan caravan battery, plus load. 

Features and Specifications

  • Ultra lightweight polymer design 1.27 kilos
  • Monocrystalline panel
  • 160 watts 
  • Nominal Output per panel 6.59 amps per hour
  • Open circuit voltage (VOC) 23.0 Volts DC
  • less than 5% the weight of regular framed panels

Kit Combinations

PWM Kit 1 comprises of:

  • 1 x 160 watt RENOGY Flexible 160 Watt Solar Panel
  • 1 x Roof Entry Grommet
  • 1 x 10 Amp PWM Charge Controller
  • 1 x Elastomer Bonding Agent
  • 2 x 3 Metre Connection Cable (MC4)

PWM Kit 2 comprises of:

  • 2 x 160 watt RENOGY Flexible 160 Watt Solar Panel
  • 1 x Double Roof Entry Grommet
  • 2 x MC4 Splitter Connectors
  • 1 x 20 Amp Dual PWM Charge Controller
  • 2 x Elastomer Bonding Agent
  • 2 x 3 Metre Connection Cable (MC4)

MPPT Kit 1 comprises of:

  • 1 x 160 watt RENOGY Flexible 160 Watt Solar Panel
  • 1 x Roof Entry Grommet
  • 1 x 10 Amp VICTRON MPPT Charge Controller
  • 1 x Elastomer Bonding Agent
  • 2 x 3 Metre Connection Cable (MC4)

MPPT Kit 2 comprises of:

  • 2 x 160 watt RENOGY Flexible 160 Watt Solar Panel
  • 1 x Double Roof Entry Grommet
  • 2 x MC4 Splitter Connectors
  • 1 x 20 Amp VICTRON MPPT Charge Controller
  • 2 x Elastomer Bonding Agent
  • 2 x 3 Metre Connection Cable (MC4)

 Panel Dimensions:

  • (L) 1503mm x (W) 673mm x (D) 2.03mm
  • Weight 2.81 Kg
Product Warranty: 2 Years

Product Name: Vango Galli Poled Drive Away Awning for Campervan
Product Description:
Vango Galli Drive Away Awning Tent

Galli Low Poled Awning for Campervans

The Vango Galli drive away awning is a great compact sized awing suitable for T5 T6 and similar sized campervans. Featuring a pre-attached extension canopy to provide extra shelter from the sun and rain, this Vango Galli also features toggled curtains to give privacy when needed. The front door has mesh door to help keep the bugs out and also allows fresh air into the living area.

If you are heading off on a long or short road trip the Vango Galli campervan drive-away awning is a great addition to your van giving you a great balance of outdoor and indoor space.

Vango Galli Drive Away Awing Features:

  • Vango PowerFlex fibreglass Poles creates a strong, yet light and reliable structure
  • Pre-angled poles achieve greater internal space than with a standard curve and provide an effective bracing against side winds
  • A linked-in groundsheet is easy to clean and can be attached or detached from the living area
  • Vango Patented TBS II Tension Band System ensures awning performs in adverse weather conditions. When tensioned, the bands brace the beam or pole at 3 points and prevent sideways movement. Can be stowed away in calm weather
  • Sentinel Active fabric is strong, fully waterproof, ensuring great quality and performance along with compact pack sizes.
  • Toggled privacy curtains
  • Mesh front door fitted with internal mesh panel for bug-free ventilation
  • High visibility guy lines minimise trip hazards
  • Adjustable pegging system allows awning to be pitched perfectly on uneven surfaces
  • Diamond clear windows maximise light
  • Covered entry gives a sheltered entrance into your awning
  • Roll away connecting tunnel for when you drive away for the day
  • Two doors in tunnel for convenient access to the front or back of your vehicle
  • Multiple attachment methods pre-attached 6mm kador, over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole & clamp
  • Carry bag with compression strap
  • Colour: Cloud Grey

Dimensions for Vango Galli Low:

  • Weight: 16.8kg
  • Packsize: L75 x H31 x W31cm
  • Pitching Time: Approx. 12 mins
  • Awning Size: Low
  • Kador Adjustable Height: 180-210cm
  • Kador Length: 240cm
  • Weight without Accessories: 9.2kg
Product Warranty: 2 Year Warranty - 3 Years when you register you Vango product though Vango website.

Product Name: Vango Bondi Awning for VW T5 T6 or Similar Campervans
Product Description:
Vango Bondi Campervan Awning

This awning is discontinued - see Vango Kela

Vango's Bondi campervan awning is a quick pitch campervan awning ideal for those looking for extra space for a couple of nights camping. Bondi is Vango's lightest and smallest packsize vehicle awning taking up very little room in your campervan. This fixed style awning needs the support of your campervan, so cannot be left free standing. The Vango Bondi is an excellent awning for storing bikes, kayaks or just sheltering from the rain.

Product Features:

  • Strong and light PowerFlex Fibreglass Poles
  • Simple and quick assembly with a single pole structure.
  • Vango TBSII Tension Band System ensures the awning performs in adverse conditions.
  • Toggled privacy curtains
  • Mesh front door for bug-free ventilation.
  • Diamond clear windows maximise light and visibility to provide a bright and airy environment
  • High level ventilation to reduce condensation
  • Comes with pre-attached 6mm kador strip, over vehicle webbing straps, roof bar attachment tabs, sleeve for pole & clamp, steel pegs with carry bag and carry bag with compression straps
  • Vango Sentinel Active fabric is strong, lightweight and fully waterproof. 

Dimensions:

  • Weight: 7.3kg
  • Packsize: L75 x H24 x W24cm
  • Pitching Time: Approx. 7 mins
  • Awning Size: Low
  • Kador Adjustable Height: 180-210cm
  • Kador Length: 258
  • Weight without Accessories: 4.6kg

Product Name: Thule Rain Blocker G2 Front Awning Panels
Product Description:
Thule Rain Blocker G2 Front Awning Panels

Providing protection against the wind and rain

The Thule Rail Blocker is the ultimate upgrade for your Thule Omnistor awning. Providing protection against the wind and rain, this front awning panel fits perfectly onto your awning with little hassle. Featuring a transparent window to allow daylight to shine through, these rain blockers can be combined to make up the length of your awning. With a range of sizes available to fit your awning exactly, no matter what length, projection or mounting height.

Crafted from high-quality PVC material, these screens are super durable, sheltering from even the harshest of weathers. All panels can be rolled up and fixed to the top of your awning with a side release buckle, allowing you to easily open up your space again when it stops raining.

Omnistor Rain Blocker Features:

  • Made from high quality PVC
  • Easy installation - simply slides into the awning lead rail
  • Rain Blocker G2 panels can be combined with smart connections
  • Strong ground fixation with included pegs and pins
  • Panels can be rolled up when not needed
  • Practical panels, mix and match to fit your awning perfectly (see guide below)

Compatibility Guide:

Please note you will need a unique combination of fronts if you are wanting to make a full length panel to suit the length of your awning.

Product Name: Fiamma Aqua 8 Campervan Motorhome Caravan Water Pump
Product Description:
Fiamma Aqua 8 Water Pump For Campervan Caravan Motorhome

Self Priming

The Fiamma Aqua 8 Water Pump for Campervan Caravan or Motorhome is a self priming pump, negative pressure pump which can pump vertically over 3 metres without priming when a demand is made via a tap, heater or shower etc.

Rugged Construction

The Fiamma Aqua 8 Water Pump is resistant to limescale deposits and oxidation, and is able to run dry without causing damage to the pump.

Negative Pressure System

The Fiamma Aqua 8 will begin pumping automatically when a drop in pressure is detected at the front of the pump.

New Improved Base Plate

The Fiamma Aqua 8 has a new improved base plate with sound absorbing feet to cut down noise and vibration in your campervan, caravan or motorhome. 

Available in 2 models

  • 12v 1.5 Bar 10 Litres Per Minute
  • 12v 1.5 Bar 7 Litres Per Minute

Features and Specifications

  • Self Priming
  • Negative Pressure System
  • Sound Absorbing Base Plate
  • MAX 3.5 Amp Current Draw
  • Ideal for Campervan, Caravan, or Motorhome Applications

Dimensions

  • H: 130mm x W: 160mm x L: 225mm
Product Warranty: 12 Months

Product Name: Avtex 12v LED Full HD TV with WiFi Campervan Motorhome Television - 279DSFVP
Product Description:
Avtex 12v LED Full HD TV Campervan Motorhome Television - 279TS-F

Providing precise clarity and vivid colours, the Avtex 279TS-F 27" 12v/24v TV boasts an abundance of terrific features to enhance the TV viewing experience in your caravan, motorhome or campervan.

Ultra Slim Design, WiFi Ready

Avtex use a slim-bezel design to maximise the viewing area even in confined spaces. It can also connect to WiFi, allowing it to take advantage of on-demand catch-up services such as BBC iPlayer via Freeview Play.

With Quick Tune and Battery Meter

This Avtex TV features an AQT one button tuning system (so you won't have to waste time and patience having to manually tune every channel yourself!), built in digital technology (DVB-T2 and DVB-S2) to enable you to receive additional HD channels through a regular aerial or satellite dish, as well as a useful low battery indicator.

12v or mains

The Avtex 279DSFVP 27" TV for caravans and motorhomes is specifically designed for mobile leisure use and operates on 12v/24v or mains. It features an intelligent design that not only looks great and fits neatly into the majority of vehicles, but also does everything you'd want from the Avtex Campervan Motorhome TV.

Features

  • 27” LED Full HD 1920 x 1080p
  • Ultra-compact design
  • Built-in DVB-T2 HD digital terrestrial tuner
  • Built-in DVB-S2 HD satellite decoder
  • AQT one button tuning system
  • On-screen battery meter
  • Wall mountable VESA standard
  • Can connect to WiFi
  • Includes Freeview Play with HD channels and on-demand catch-up

Dimensions

  • w620 x h364 x d47 (without stand)
  • Weight 4.5kg

Product Name: Vision Plus Status 270 Campervan Caravan TV Aerial
Product Description:
Vision Plus Status 270 Campervan Caravan TV Aerial

The Vision Plus Status 270 Caravan TV Aerial is similar to the fabled Vision Plus Status 355;

It looks and fits the same as the 355, but benefits from a smaller footprint, making the Status 270 ideal for ridged campervan, or smooth caravan and motorhome rooves.

The Vision plus Status 270 comes from a long line of absolutely the best omni-directional aerials for the campervan market.

The Vision Plus Status 270 Aerial: Transmission and Reception:

In a number of countries overseas as well as the UK, TV signals are transmitted horizontally and vertically, with vertical receptions requiring a vertical receiver.

The Vision Plus Status 270 Aerial accomplishes this using it’s new improved dipole array

Please note:

  • TV reception can be greatly affected by the orientation of the antenna, and as such it’s crucial that all antennas are mounted level!

Features

  • Ideal for campervan conversions
  • Low aerodynamic profile
  • Lightweight compact design
  • Narrow streamlined mounting foot - ideal for ridged rooves
  • Receives horizontal and vertical signals through 360 degrees
  • VP2 amplifier with variable gain adjustment
  • Easy to install with step by step instructions

Specifications

  • Diameter - Antenna Dome 270 x 285 mm
  • Diameter - Mounting Foot 150 x 70 mm
  • Height - Overall 136 mm
  • Height - Foot 31 mm
  • Amplifier 115 x 46 x 29 mm
Product Availability: In stock & sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Name: John Guest Speed Fitting 12mm Equal Tee Connector
Product Description:
John Guest Speed Fitting 12mm Equal Tee Connector - NCPM0212E

John Guest Speedfit is a push-fit system suitable for the plumbing of hot and cold water services and central heating applications, including pressurised and combi systems.

This Tee connector is an ideal John Guest Fitting for branching off 12mm pipe from your main campervan caravan water supply. Quick fits to 12mm rigid pipe.

Pipe Tolerances

These John Guest fittings are intended for pipes with outside diameters of 12mm to fit to rigid 12mm pipework.

These fitting are only compatible with John Guest pipe and are not suitable for 12mm flexible hose.

 These fitting are only compatible with John Guest pipe and are not suitable for 12mm flexible hose.

Product Description:
Dometic RTX1000 24v Truck Parking Cooler

The Dometic RTX1000 is a Self-contained, and battery-operated truck roof parking cooler with up to 12 h running time. 24v operation makes it ideal for the commercial vehicle market, such as trucks, class 2, 7.5 tonne and HGV

Highly efficient:

The RTX1000 Truck Parking Cooler takes a MAX 8 amps in ECO Mode at 24Vdc, Other modes are BOOST and AUTO.

In BOOST mode, the RTX1000 parking cooler cools the vehicle interior for not more than 20 min at maximum power and then switches to AUTO mode.

When the set temperature is reached, the RTX1000 switches to AUTO mode before the 20 min is reached. In AUTO mode, the fan and compressor speed are controlled automatically. In ECO mode the fan and compressor speed are controlled automatically.

The compressor power is limited in ECO mode electronically.

Can be installed in existing roof hatch and with a maximum tilt of 8 degrees, vehicle specific installation kit required, call for further details.

NOTES: Unsuitable for use in agricultural or construction vehicles.

Whilst the RTX1000 is designed to cool when vehicle is parked, it can also be used on the move to a MAX speed of 130Kmh

 

Requires additional vehicle specific fixing kit for installation
Product Warranty: 12 months
Product Availability: #Special Order - lead times may vary
Category: Caravan, Campervan & Motorhome/Heaters and Air Conditioners/Air Conditioners;Caravan, Campervan & Motorhome

Product Description:
Dometic Coolair RT780 24v Truck Cooler

The Dometic CoolAir RT 780 rooftop parking cooler is designed for day trips and inner-city distribution services.

It gives drivers a pleasant climate during shorter stops and unavoidable waiting periods, e.g. when loading and unloading.

As a self-contained air conditioner, the CoolAir RT 780 integrates all components in a single housing. Installation is quickly done, and there’s no need for maintenance either. Good to know: the CoolAir RT 780 fits almost every truck. It comes in two versions, with 0° or 12° compressor tilt, to accommodate different roof designs. Tailor-made installation kits are available for all common truck models.

 Features:

  • Standard unit suitable for almost every truck
  • UV resistant cover shell can be spray-painted to match external bodywork
  • Settings conveniently managed by remote control
  • Single unit design means quick fit and low maintenance - no need to even fill up with refrigerant
  • Flexible air flow through four individually adjustable nozzles
  • Outstanding air cooling and dehumidification

Specifications

  • Input Voltage 24v DC
  • Power Consumption (Cooling Mode) 530 Watts
  • Net Weight 22kg
  • CE and e1 certified

Requires additional vehicle specific fixing kit for installation

Dimensions:

  • Product Height 284mm
  • Product Width  830mm
  • Product Depth  629mm
Product Availability: The Dometic RT780 Truck Cooler  is sent on a next working day delivery

Product Name: 15mm Lightweight Ply for Campervan in Brushed White
Product Description:
Lightweight Furniture Ply Wood - 15mm in Brushed White

Our Brushed White lightweight furniture ply board wood is available to purchase from our store in sheets with dimensions of 2500mm x 1220mm x 15mm. These boards can then be cut to size as required.

  • Brushed white textured finish
  • Veneer on both sides
  • Laminate coating
  • Resistant to scratches and impact
  • 9-ply CPL construction
  • lighter than MFC Chipboard by 50%
  • Suitable for campervan conversions
  • Suitable for both horizontal and vertical surfaces
  • Manufactured from PEFC sustainable timber
  • Manufactured in the UK

Our 15mm ply is available for collection from our store only

Due to the large size and weight of this product we are unable to deliver, so lightweight ply is only available for collection from our retail outlet in Wirral (postcode: CH63 3PR) just between Chester and Liverpool in North West England. We strongly advise you give our sales team a call on 0151 334 0222 prior to your visit to confirm and/or reserve stock.

Product Name: Reich Trend E Campervan Caravan Chrome Mixer Tap
Product Description:
Reich Trend E Campervan Caravan Chrome Mixer Tap

An elegant mixer tap from Reich that perfectly adds a touch of style to your campervan or caravan kitchen or bathroom

Overview

Made from a high quality plastic construction with a chrome finish, the Reich Trend E is built in the same fashion as a quality household tap that is ideal as a Campervan tap, or a caravan tap.

The Reich Trend E has a ceramic cartridge that makes it much lighter than it's metallic counterparts, and thus ideal as a motorhome or campervan tap.

Versatile

The Reich Trend E has a microswitch fitted for use with Submersible pumps, or it can also be used on a negative pressure pump, such as a shurflo trail king (up to 45psi)

Features

  • Brand: Reich
  • 12mm Water Connections
  • Requires 33mm Hole
  • Suitable for Submersible (Microswitched) or Negative Pressure Onboard Pumps

Product Name: Vango Faros III Low Poled Campervan Awning
Product Description:
Vango Faros III Low Drive Away Awning 

The Vango Faros III is the latest model poled awning tent for campervan and motorhomes.

The Faros III is the latest lightweight poled drive away awning tent from Vango. It features Vango's Sentinel Active fabric, ensuring a compact pack size, ideal for short breaks away without taking up unnecessary storage space. This drive away campervan awning can be left freestanding while you head out for the day and then easily reattached on your return thanks to its multi attachment options and simple double entry tunnel structure. The large front door with mesh panel creates a great living space making this awning a great addition to your vehicle on short breaks away.

Vango Faros III Poled Features:

  • Carry bag included.
  • Fully wind and rain tested
  • Two doors in connecting tunnel.
  • Toggle curtains on every window.
  • Front door with internal mesh fly screen.
  • Diamond clear windows maximise natural light.
  • Connecting tunnel rolls away when not needed.
  • Lightweight Sentinel Active 75D fabric is compact and waterproof.
  • Ventilation panels improve airflow and help to reduce condensation.
  • Flat entry access door for wheelchairs, prams and people with reduced mobility.
  • Multiple vehicle attachment methods; pre-attached 6mm kador, 8M throw-over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole & clamp system.
  • Supplied with steel pegs.
  • Strong fibreglass poles.
  • Sewn-in Groundsheet.

Faros III Low Drive Away Awning Specifications

  • Weight: 10.8kg
  • Depth: 275.0cm
  • Height: 205.0cm
  • Width: 290.0cm
  • Pitching Time: 8mins
  • Kador Length: 260cm
  • Kador Height: 180cm - 210cm
  • Fabric: Sentinel A
  • Connection Width: 240cm
  • Pack size (Bag 1): L68.0 x H24.0 x W28.0cm
  • Bag 1: Weight 10.0kg
  • Rail Weight: 5.6kg
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3,000mm
Product Warranty: Vango 3 years warranty if registered with Vango
Product Availability: Vango Faros Campervan Awning is sent via next day delivery

Product Name: Thetford Aqua Kem Porta Potti Pink & Green Eco Friendly Concentrate Chemical Duo Pack
Option Set: Thetford Aqua Kem Concentrate Duo Pack
Product Description:
Thetford Aqua Kem Camping Caravan Toilet Chemical Duo Pack

Pink Aqua Kem Rinse + Green or Blue Waste Tank Chemical

Now available as a duo pack, the new style Thetford toilet chemical solutions are not only space-saving in terms of size, but also offer improved performance when compared to their predecessor. Both packs include the venerable Aqua Kem Pink concentrated, as well as a choice of the new and improved Aqua Kem Blue or Green concentrated chemicals.

Thetford Aqua Kem Rinse Flush Chemical - Pink

  • Eco-friendly and septic-tank safe
  • Compact bottle, less weight
  • Reduced plastic, eco-friendly
  • Helps prevent limescale and keep your toilet shiny
  • Enables a smoother toilet flush
  • Leaves a fresh lavender smell with every flush
  • Suitable for ceramic or plastic bowl toilets
  • 750ml concentrated bottle equivalent to 1.5L standard
  • Up to 5 days from 1 dose
  • Remains liquid up to -20°C

Thetford Aqua Kem Waste Tank Chemical - Green

  • Eco-friendly and safe for use in septic tanks
  • Liquefication improved vs previous Aqua Kem Green
  • Enhanced reduction of gas build-up vs previous Aqua Kem Green
  • Enhanced waste tank cleaning vs standard Aqua Kem Green
  • Single dose lasts up to 4 days
  • 750ml concentrated bottle equivalent to 1.5L standard
  • Remains liquid up to -20°C
  • More compact and lightweight bottle

Thetford Aqua Kem Waste Tank Chemical - Blue

  • Thetford's most powerful waste tank chemical
  • The original waste tank additive
  • 1 dose of Aqua Kem Blue can last for up to 5 days
  • Liquefies waste for easier tank emptying
  • Excellent odor control
  • Reduces gas build-up
Product Availability: The Thetford Aqua Kem Concentrate camping toilet chemical due pack is sent on a next working day courier!

Product Name: Vango Palm Driveaway Airbeam Awning for Campervan
Product Description:
Vango Palm Airbeam Awning for Campervans

Inflatable Drive Away Awning Tent

The Vango Palm drive away inflatable air awning creates the perfect space for all your gear, whether you're a family who needs a little more room for when the weathers bad or a couple who needs room for the bikes or paddle boards. Vango's Palm awning features two side doors tunnel entrances meaning you can access from either side of your campervan to create a corridor between the campervan and awning. The large front door ensures that when the sun comes out you can roll back the door and enjoy the rays, or zip the front mesh door to keep the bugs out. The Palm inflatable awning is lightweight and easy to erect in just eight minutes!

Product Features:

  • Vango Air Beam is quick to pitch and creates a strong and rigid structure
  • Vango's Sentinel Active Fabric is lightweight, waterproof, durable and is compact when packed down
  • Air Speed Valve System
  • TBS II Tension Band System ensures your Vango Palm awning performs in adverse weather conditions
  • Air Zone Ventilation reduces condensation and improves air circulation
  • Vango patented TBS II Tension Band System ensures awning performs well in adverse weather conditions. Tensioners can be stowed away in calm weather
  • High Visibility Guy lines
  • Adjustable Pegging System
  • Toggled Privacy Curtains
  • Two Doors in Tunnel
  • Bracer Pole included to enhance stability
  • Flat Entry Groundsheet ensures no trip hazard
  • Internal mesh front door panel for bug free ventilation
  • Linked-in Groundsheet can be easily cleaned and can be attached or detached from the living area
  • Diamond Clear Windows maximise light and visibility to provide a bright and airy space
  • King pole doors with integrated eyelets allow optional king poles to prop open doors and create a sun canopy
  • Multiple Attachment Methods include pre-attached 6mm kador, over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole and clamp
  • Roll Away Connecting Tunnel for when you drive away your campervan for the day
  • Supplied with Double Action Pump to rapidly inflate your awning, complete with a pressure dial
  • Easy pack carry bag  

Dimensions:

  • Weight without Accessories: 6.1kg

Product Name: Vango Cove Air III Low Drive-away Awning
Product Description:
Vango Cove Air III Low Awning

Drive Away Inflatable Campervan Awning

The Vango Cove III Low drive away awning is the latest version of this popular campervan awning. Designed to fit campervans with a connection height of 180-210cm it is the ideal addition to a VW T6 or similar sized van conversion. The Cove Air awning features a spacious living area with enough room for table and chairs or providing additional storage space for camping gear. 

Front Facing Porch Awning

This front-facing inflatable drive away awning features windows and a door facing the same direction as your van, giving you the best view both inside and outside and added privacy from neighbours. In addition, a generous covered porch is perfect for grabbing some shade or when sheltering from the rain. The diamond clear windows in the Vango Cove III Low awning let in plenty of natural light, creating a bright and airy atmosphere, while the toggle back curtains offer privacy when needed.  

Ideal for weekends and extended trips away, the Cove Air Low is perfect for couples looking for some extra space. With the addition of an optional bedroom inner tent (Vango BR001) the Cove will sleep two comfortably making it ideal for families and friends alike. With a double-action pump included the Vango Cove Air driveaway awning is quick to pitch in approx. 10 minutes, giving you more time to enjoy your campervan holiday!

Vango Cove Air Low Awning Features:

  • Side Attachment Awning ensures you are always facing the view wherever you go
  • Covered entry to keep you dry on rainy days
  • Sewn-in Groundsheet
  • Vango's Sentinel Active fabric is lightweight yet strong and fully waterproof
  • Pre-angled beams mean greater internal space and effective bracing against winds
  • Vango Patented TBSII Tension Band System ensures your campervan awning performs in adverse weather conditions
  • Diamond Clear Windows maximise light and visibility
  • Toggled Privacy Curtains
  • Internal mesh front door panel for bug-free ventilation
  • Two Doors in Tunnel for convenient access to the front or back of your vehicle
  • Roll Away Connecting Tunnel for when you drive away from your campervan for the day
  • High and low level ventilation panels reduce condensation
  • Multiple Attachment Methods include pre-attached 6mm kador, over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole and clamp

Vango Cove Awning Specification:

  • Total Weight 17.30kg
  • Canvas weight 6.70kg
  • Packed Dimensions: L74cm x W 41cm x H 41cm
  • Dimensions: L 310cm x W 320xm x H 205cm
  • Kadar Length 260cm
  • Kadar adjustable height 180-210cm
  • Pitching Time: Approx. 10 mins

Cove Awning optional Extras:

  • Bedroom inner tent, sleeps 2 - BR001
  • Vango Universal carpet fits Cove awning - CP004
  • Footprint groundsheet protector - GP001
  • Vango drive away fixing kit 4x6mm or 6x6mm

Product Description:
The Flojet 12v Automatic Self-Priming Water Pump

The Flojet pressurised water pump is designed to be fitted inside campervans, caravans and motorhomes. Suitable for use with push fit water connections, the Flojet water pump is ideal for providing a continuous and consistent water feed throughout your system. 

The Flojet water pump for Truma water systems features:

•    Easy snap-in fittings for quick fitment.
•    Noise absorbent mounts to keep noise to a minimum.
•    Corrosion resistant materials.
•    Reduces need for accumulator tank

5.3 Litre Per Minute Flojet pump specifications:

•    Pump: Three chamber diaphragm design, self-priming up to 9 feet suction lift, pump able to run dry without damage
•    Operating voltage: 12V DC
•    Pressure: 30psi / 2.06bar
•    Flow: 1.4 GPM 5.3 Lt (LPM)
•    Meets ISO 8846 (Ignition protection)

Dimensions:

•    Height 121mm

•    Width 152mm
•    Weight 1.59kg

Model No.: 3426 Series

Flojet water pumps are factory water tested prior to shipping. Some residual water may be present during installation. This is not a fault or sign of previous use.

Product Name: Victron Orion-Tr Smart DC-DC Battery to Battery Charger 30 Amp For 12v Campervan Motorhome Batteries
Product Description:
Victron Orion Smart 12v DC-DC Battery Charger 30 Amps For Campervans Or Motorhomes 

Victron Orion-Tr Smart DC to DC Battery to Battery Charger

Managing dual battery systems in vehicles and boats is now easier with the Victron Orion-Tr DC-DC Battery to Battery Charger. This guide explores its features, functionalities, and benefits.

What does the Victron Orion-Tr Smart do

  • Charges a secondary (service) battery from the main (starter) battery in a dual battery system.
  • Uses a three-stage charging algorithm to optimise battery life and prevent overcharging.
  • Compatible with both lead-acid, AGM and lithium batteries (with correct settings).
  • Is available in various models with different current ratings to suit your needs.

Key features:

  • Smart alternator compatibility: Works with modern vehicles with smart alternators that vary their output voltage.
  • Engine running detection: Only charges the service battery when the engine is running, protecting the starter battery.
  • Remote control and monitoring: Can be controlled and monitored via Bluetooth with the VictronConnect app.
  • High efficiency:  The Victron Orion-Tr Smart DC-DC charger achieves up to 95% efficiency, minimising heat generation and energy loss.
  • Compact design: Is available in a small footprint for easy installation in tight spaces.

Benefits:

  • Extends the life of your leisure battery by providing controlled charging.
  • Prevents accidental discharge of the starter battery by only charging when the engine is running.
  • Provides convenient monitoring and control via your smartphone or tablet.
  • Improves overall efficiency of your electrical system.

Things to consider:

  • Choose the appropriate model based on your battery capacity and desired charging current.
  • Ensure proper installation and configuration for optimal performance and safety.
  • Lithium batteries are supported but please refer to the battery manufacturer for correct settings

Victron Orion-Tr Smart Specs:

  • Input voltage 10-17v DC
  • Suitable for charging Lithium Batteries (See useful links below)
  • Adjustable Output Voltage Range 10-15v DC
  • Continuous power output at 25 DEG C 430 Watts
  • Continuous power output at 40 DEG C 360 Watts
  • Efficiency 87%
  • Off Load Current <80mA
  • Product code ORI121236120 and ORI121236140

Dimensions:

  • L 80mm x W 186mm x H (Inc Terminals) 130mm
  • Weight 1.8kg

Useful Links

New Product Vlog Orion Tr Smart

Careful! – Alternator Charging Lithium

Remote Status Checks

The Orion-Tr Smart Campervan Battery to Battery Charger is equipped with built-in Bluetooth, so the status of the charger and the battery can be checked on a smartphone, tablet or laptop.

All settings of the charger can be configured with the VictronConnect app.

Product Name: Victron BMS 12/200 for 12.8 Volt Lithium-Iron-Phosphate Batteries
Product Description:
Victron BMS 12/200 for 12.8 Volt Lithium-Iron-Phosphate Batteries.

Especially Designed For Campervan and Motorhome Applications.

The Victron BMS12/200 is a simple solution to charging LiFePO4 (Lithium Iron Phosphate) batteries, from alternators.

Why is a Battery Management System essential for charging lithium batteries?

A Lithium Iron Phosphate Battery cell will be damaged if the voltage over the cell increases to more than 4,2V, similarly, the battery will be damaged if the voltage in the cell drops below 2.5v. The Victron BMS12/200 prevents these outcomes.

Safe Alternator Charging

Charging Lithium Iron Phosphate Batteries from a standard alternator poses the real possibility of burning out the alternator, as unlike lead -acid batteries, the current demand for a LiFePO4 battery, can even exceed the total ahrs of the battery. 

At low speeds (Like engine idle) the alternator cannot cope with the excessive high current demand, and will rapidly overheat, often to the point of burning out the coil.

The Victron BMS 12/200 will regulate the current demand from the battery thus keeping the alternator temperature at safe levels.

Specifications

  • Dimensions H65mm x W120mm x D260mm
  • Weight 1.8kg
  • MAX. Charge Current (Port AB) 80 amps at 40 DEG Centigrade
  • MAX. Charge Current (Port LB) 200 amps at 40 DEG Centigrade
  • Approximate cutoff voltage 11vdc
  • MAX. Number of 12.8v Batteries x 10

Important Information

Careful! – Alternator Charging Lithium 

Important Information For The Charging Of Lithium Iron Phosphate Batteries (LiFePO4) From Alternators

Product Name: Pyranha Venture Kayaks Islay 12 - Touring Kayak
Product Description:
Venture Islay 12 - Touring Kayak

Special order for collection only. Lead approx. time approx. 2-4 week

Choose the Venture Islay 12 kayak for:

  • The stability and manageability of a recreational kayak, but with greater hull efficiency.
  • A mixture of day trips and weekend adventures.
  • Easier manoeuvrability than a longer touring or sea kayak.

The Venture Islay 12 is an adventure touring kayak. It is the perfect choice for anyone who wants a recreational kayak with a little more speed and storage capacity for adventures while maintaining good manoeuvrability.

Islay 12 Features:

  • Fit 4 Sport Seat: deep-fill, padded seat, adjustable pivot seat for added comfort, thigh grips for comfort and control, oversized hip pads and floating backrest for increased connectivity, compatible with spray decks. 
  • MZ3 Construction: the same white water grade polyethylene used for its supreme impact resistance in Pyranha whitewater kayaks.
  • Hatches: Two water resistant storage hatches with market-leading Kajak Sport hatch covers. 
  • Deck bungees: to maps, hats or drinks bottles close to hand.
  • Retractable skeg: leave up for manoeuvrability, drop down for directional control.
  • Twist lock footrests.
  • Toggle handles.
  • Venture kayaks produce high UV, scratch, and impact resistant boats.

Islay 12 Dimensions:

  • Size: 12 
  • Length: 385cm
  • Width: 66cm
  • Weight 25.5kg
  • Max Paddler Weight: 124kg
  • Deck Size: XL

Optional accessories available to order:

  • Flush mount fishing rod holders
  • Deck pod

Available in a choice of colours:

  • Lizard Green
  • Fuego Orange
  • Ocean Turquoise 

Note:

  • The Venture Islay 12 is available as an LV (low volume) version for lighter paddlers - enquire for details.
  • The Fit 4 Sport seat is standard on the Islay 12 but can be ordered with a Fit 4 seat (high back rest and deluxe padded seat).
Product Warranty: Venture kayaks take pride in the design and quality of its kayaks and canoes, and each one is built to take you on a lifetime of adventures. This is why Venture offer a Lifetime Warranty* as standard. (* Valid to the original owner against defects in materials or workmanship for the lifetime of the product).
Product Availability: #The Venture Islay 12 special order for COLLECTION only 2-4 weeks

Product Name: Venture Islay Cruiser Fit 4 Recreational Touring Kayak
Product Description:
Venture Islay Cruiser Recreational Touring Kayak

Islay Cruiser is special order for collection only. Lead time approx. 2-4 weeks

Choose the Islay Cruiser kayak for:

  • Short to medium adventures.
  • Stability and performance.
  • Easy storage and transport.
  • The easy access and all-day comfort of a spacious cockpit and luxurious outfitting.
  • Great UK design and build quality without the added weight, gimmicks or expense.

The Islay Cruiser:

The Venture Islay Cruiser kayak has an extra-large cockpit for easy access and does not require the use of a spray deck, ideal for beginner or recreational paddlers. Designed for comfort without compromising on performance. The Islay Cruiser's stability will keep you focused on the sights and sounds around you, whilst great straight line tracking, easy maneuverability, and a highly efficient hull all combine for comfortable, almost effortless performance.

Features:

  • Fit4 outfitting : The Fit 4 high backrest and deluxe padded seat ensure you can relax and enjoy the unique experiences and environments kayaking will take you.
  • Adjustable seat.
  • MZ3 Construction: the same white water grade polyethylene used for its supreme impact resistance in Pyranha's white water kayaks.
  • Hatches: One large water resistant storage hatch. An optional mini bow hatch is available to order separately.
  • Retractable skeg: leave up for maneuverability, drop down for directional control.
  • Twist lock footrests.
  • Toggle handles.

Product Name: Pyranha Venture Canoe Prospector 155 Cruiser in Corelite
Product Description:
Venture Prospector 155 Cruiser Canoe

Venture canoes are special order for collection only. Lead time approx. 4 weeks

  • A traditional style canoe without compromise
  • Overnight trips and wilderness expeditions
  • Familiar performance and impressive load capacity

The Venture Prospector is a traditional style canoe that excels on wilderness expeditions and whitewater trips, making it popular with enthusiasts and outdoor centres across the globe.

The historic Prospector designs that this model is based upon were true workhorses, and the Venture Prospector shares their ability to maintain supreme edging performance for pleasingly smooth turns on both moving and flat water, even when fully loaded.

Cruiser Spec:

Reliable outfitting for relaxing adventures.

  • Oiled wood web seats - durable and attractive.
  • Contoured carrying yoke - fitted balanced, oiled to match the seats and shaped for comfortable shoulder carrying. The yoke also provides rigidity to the boat's shell.
  • Durable, moulded end decks - integrated, ergonomically shaped handle for comfortable carrying. 
  • Heavy duty alloy seat hangars - Can be reversed for an angled kneeling seat.
  • Tough vinyl gunwales.

Corelite Construction:

Triple layer, polyethylene foam sandwich material for a great stiffness to weight ratio with tried and tested durability.

Size:

  • Length: 464cm
  • Width: 91cm
  • Depth: 36cm
  • Rocker: moderate
  • Weight: 36kg
  • Max load capacity: 370kg

Optional Extras:

  • Additional centre seat.
  • Kneeling thwart
  • Lacing
  • Airbags

Product Name: Pyranha Venture Flex Fit 4 - Recreational Kayak
Product Description:
Venture Flex Kayak - Recreational Touring Kayak

Venture Flex is collection only. Lead time approx. 2-4 weeks.

Choose the Venture Flex kayak for:

  • A lightweight, stable, and easy to use kayak.
  • Relaxed, short distance trips.
  • Easy transport and storage.


The Flex is one of Venture's most popular boats. Its compact size makes it perfect for those looking to explore canals and rivers, take short coastal trips or enjoy a tranquil day on the lake. The venture Flex has excellent stability and is easy to paddle making it a great choice for beginners and experienced paddlers alike. With its large cockpit for easy access, and a roomy day hatch for your picnic, you'll be having fun on the water in no time.

The Flex by Venture kayaks features:

  • MZ3 impact resistant construction: the same white water grade polyethylene used in Pyranha white water kayaks.

Product Description:
Venture Islay 14 Adventure Touring Kayak

Choose this kayak for:

  • Medium to long distance journeys.
  • Exploring lakes, canals and gentle rivers with ease and the confidence to take photos from the kayak.
  • The best combination of hull efficiency, speed, and a manageable size.

A longer kayak is a faster kayak, allowing you to cover larger distances. The Islay 14 is an adventure touring kayak with a length similar to that of a sea kayak, but in a design that offers a little more stability and manoeuvrability.
The Pyranha Venture Islay 14 is ideal for beginners and intermediate paddlers who want to go on medium to long distance journeys, weekend adventures and relaxed journeys of up to a week in length on canals, sheltered lakes, and gentle rivers.

Product Name: Eberspacher Miniwash and Handiwash  Campervan Wash Station
Product Description:
Eberspacher Miniwash and Handiwash  Campervan Wash Station

The Eberspacher Miniwash and Handiwash are a perfect internal/external solutions to handwashing without the need of a waterpump, seperate water container or mains supply.

12 Volt Operation

Featuring a 12v, heavy duty, yet low powered heating element, and utilising corrosion resistant materials and state of the art electronics, the Eberspacher Miniwash thermostatically controls water temperature to 49°C. The miniwash and handiwash are also protected by a thermal overload safety device for safety in or on your horsebox, campervan or motorhome.

Product Name: Igloo Recool Eco-Friendly Biodegradable Ice Cool Box
Product Description:
Igloo Recool - The First Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Cool Box!

Please visit our sister site IglooCoolers.co.uk to order Recool cool boxes in bulk quantities

The Igloo Recool is the worlds first eco-friendly ice cool box. Igloo RECOOL cool boxes are biodegradable and fully compostable!

Impressive Igloo Cooler Performance

The Igloo RECOOL cool box is not only environmentally friendly, but it also boars impressive performance, with up to 12 hours ice retention! The RECOOL can even hold water for up-to 5 days and can withstand loads of up to 34Kg.

Fully Re-usable

The Igloo Recool cool box can be reused. Simply allow your Igloo RECOOL to dry out in between uses and it will be ready to use again. You can also use the Igloo RECOOL continuously for up-to 5 days thanks to it's water resistance properties. The Recool cool box is made from recycled paper and held together by a wax product making it water resistent. The RECOOL from Igloo also includes moulded cup holders and handles for convenience.

Igloo Coolers Recool Cool Box Features:

  • The worlds first eco-friendly cool box
  • 100% compostable material - biodegradable
  • 15 litres capacity
  • Moulded side handles
  • Moulded cup holders
  • Up-to 12 hours ice retention
  • Up-to 5 days water resistance
  • 34kg maximum load weight
  • Stackable design
  • Retail display box available for packs of 12

Igloo Recool Specification:

  • Model: Igloo RECOOL Eco Friendly Cool Box
  • Model Number: 26030
  • Ice Retention: Up to 12 hours*
  • Water Resistance: Up to 5 days
  • Capacity: 15 Litres / 16 Quarts (approx. 20 x 330 ml drink cans)
  • Weight: Under 1kg

Igloo Recool Cool Box Dimensions:

  • Exterior Dimensions (L x W x H): 66.5 x 41.7 x 40.8cm

*Ice retention figures are supplied for guidance only and may vary dependent on actual usage.
  Please click here for further information on how this is measured and how to maximise the performance of your cool box.

Product Name: Eberspacher Airtronic D4 Motorhome Horsebox Diesel Space Heater with Internal Mounting Plate
Product Description:
Eberspacher Airtronic D4 Motorhome Horsebox Diesel Space Heater with Internal Mounting Plate

Airtronic D4 Overview

The Eberspacher Airtronic D4 Motorhome DIesel Heater, is a more powerful version of the Airtronic D2 campervan heater, and is designed for larger scale Motorhomes, Coachbuilts, Horsebox, and A and C class vehicles. Whilst only being slightly larger, it offers optimised fuel efficiency, a range of operation modes and unsurpassed safety standards.

Applications

The Eberspacher Airtronic D4, is a programmable independent heating system. Therefore it does not use heat from the engine, and is certified for use in all types of larger motorhomes, such as coachbuilts, 7.5 ton conversions, and A-class Motorhomes.

The Airtronic D4 is also certified for installation in passenger areas and in proximity to dangerous substances.

Technical Details

 

 

Eberspacher Troubleshooting Guide
Product Warranty:
Jacksons Leisure Supplies are an authorised Eberspacher dealer. As such, our Airtronic D2L campervan and motorhome diesel heaters include a 3 year limited parts and labour warranty.

Your Eberspacher Airtronic D2L diesel heater must be installed by a suitably qualified engineer and in compliance with all industry application and safety regulations as well as manufacturer procedures and guidelines.

To maintain your 2nd and 3rd year warranty, your Airtronic D2L must be serviced in accordance with the manufacturers warranty terms and conditions by an accredited Eberspacher service agent.

Product Description:
Venture Jura Performance Touring Sea Kayak - Ocean Turquoise

Choose this kayak for:

  • Advancing from a touring kayak to a focus on sea kayaking.
  • A sea kayak with more room to stretch than a traditional design.
  • Learning to sea kayak with confidence.

Whether you're progressing into sea kayaking from adventure touring, or being introduced straight to the sea, the Jura kayak will look after you during your first paddle strokes, yet has all the performance and features you'll need to continue well beyond this.

A Venture Jura MV kayak will be on display in our shop from January 2020. Kayaks and canoes are available to order for collection only.

  • Retractable skeg: leave up for manoeuvrability, drop down for directional control.

Product Name: Pyranha Venture Kayaks Islay 14 TriLite MV - Adventure Touring Kayak
Product Description:
Venture Islay 14 TriLite Adventure Touring Kayak

Choose this kayak for:

  • Medium to long distance journeys.
  • Exploring lakes, canals and gentle rivers with ease and the confidence.
  • The best combination of hull efficiency, speed, and a manageable size.

A longer kayak is a faster kayak, allowing you to cover larger distances. The Venture Islay 14 is an adventure touring kayak with a length similar to that of a sea kayak, but in a design that offers a little more stability and manoeuvrability.
The Venture Islay 14 is ideal for beginners and intermediate paddlers who want to go on medium to long distance journeys, weekend adventures and relaxed journeys of up to a week in length on canals, sheltered lakes, and gentle rivers.

Features:

  • Fit4 Sport Seat: deep-fill, padded seat, adjustable pivot seat for added comfort, thigh grips for comfort and control, oversized hip pads and floating backrest for increased connectivity, compatible with spray decks. 
  • TriLite construction increases hull stiffness and reduces weight, enhancing the performance of the boat. Easier to rooftop, easier to carry, easier to paddle.
  • Hatches: Two water resistant storage hatches with market-leading Kajak Sport hatch covers.
  • Deck bungees: to maps, hats or drinks bottles close to hand.
  • Retractable skeg: leave up for manoeuvrability, drop down for directional control.
  • Twist-lock footrests.
  • Toggle handles.
  • Venture kayaks produce high UV, scratch, and impact resistant boats.

Size:

  • Length: 427cm

  • Weight 25kg

  • Deck Size: XL

Available in a choice of colours:

  • Sunset Pink with grey inner

Product Name: YAK High Back Buoyancy Aid 60N Red or Navy - Watersports PFD
Product Description:
YAK High Back Buoyancy Aid 60N

Watersports buoyancy aid for kayak, canoe and SUP

The ultimate buoyancy aid for your next touring adventure, river, calm or choppy sea, the High Back 60N provides the most advanced solutions in comfort technology design. It’s raised back profile buoyancy placement means that no matter what type of boat you are in, you can be assured of its comfort.

In addition, the High Back 60N PFD provides breathable air flow technology helping you stay cool on even the warmest of days and a sculpted foam design helping to ensure the buoyancy aid moulds to the shape of your body to ensure comfort all day long.

  • 4D cast technology for ultimate wearer comfort
  • Superlight foam
  • Adjustable shoulders
  • Twin waist adjustment
  • Multiple attachment points
  • Extra-large front pockets
  • High back buoyancy for increased comfort when using a seat

Product Name: Ainsworth Paddles - Classic C100 Canoe Paddle Alloy Shaft, 145cm
Product Description:
Ainsworth Canoe Paddle

Classic C100 (AFT) Alloy Straight Shaft, 145cm

Ainsworth takes pride in creating the strongest, lightest and most durable canoe paddles on the market.

Classic C100 is one of Ainsworth canoe paddle's best selling products. This paddle is designed for the canoe fanatic looking for a light, durable all round blade. Fitted with a comfortable T grip, the paddle’s blade has natural floatation and hence feels light in the water. This paddle is both great on flat water touring and on white water and is a great first paddle for any canoeist.

AFT Blades: The C100 Classic Canoe Paddle feature AFT - Advanced Foam Technology - blades. AFT paddle blades are made using a unique polyurethane foam construction to produce a canoe paddle which is tough but is also light and floaty. AFT is unique to Ainsworth Paddles.

Alloy Shaft: Ainsworth has been making alloy shafted canoe paddles for over 45 years. They produce aluminium alloy that surpasses all its competitors. The titanium enriched alloy is the same spec used in aircraft construction, it offers the very best corrosion resistance of any aluminium alloy along with a very high tensile strength.
Product Warranty: Ainsworth Paddles are very confident in the performance of its canoe paddles and offers a one year warranty. The warranty applies from the date of purchase of your Ainsworth canoe paddle and is restricted to the original purchaser. It covers defects in materials and craftsmanship under normal use. Note that the warranty does not cover paddle edge wear. Damages due to paddle abuse, negligence or normal wear and tear will be repaired or replaced for a very reasonable charge.

Product Name: YAK Mens Horizon Kayak Dry Suit
Product Description:
Yak Horizon Drysuit

Immersion dry suit for kayaking, canoeing or SUP

The Horizon drysuit is tailored using 3-layer breathable material technology, with enhanced waterproof properties. This, combined with the twin neck seal system, latex wrists and low-profile fabric socks, keeps the wearer warm and dry no matter what the activity - kayak, canoe or SUP. With an adjustable waist band, a unique stretch mesh back panel and adjustable braces, the Horizon creates a custom-fit feel for a wide range of sizes. Plus, the pre-articulated arms and legs provides unrestrictive movement to enhance the suit’s athletic performance.

The cross shoulder YKK Aquaseal, flexible dry zip is positioned for minimum restriction and allows the wearer to put on the suit easily. Additionally, Cordura reinforced double layered seat and knees provide extra protection to the areas of high wear to increase longevity and durability.

YAK Kayak Drysuit Features:

  •     Hard wearing 3-layer breathable material
  •     YKK aqua seal plastic cross shoulder & relief
  •     Dry zips with protective cover
  •     Reinforced double layer seat & knee areas
  •     Lower back stretch panel for additional flexibility
  •     Articulated arm & leg design
  •     Twin latex & glide skin neoprene neck seals
  •     Twin adjustment single lined neoprene waistband
  •     Easy seal replacement
  •     Ankle and wrist adjusters
  •     Removable adjustable braces
  •     Reflective highlights
  •     2 year manufacturer’s warranty
Product Warranty: YAK canoe and kayak paddling kit comes with a two year manufacturers warranty

Product Name: Dometic RC 10.4T 90 Campervan Caravan Motorhome Compressor Fridge
Product Description:
Dometic RC 10.4T 90 Double Hinged Campervan Caravan Motorhome Compressor Fridge

Overview

The Dometic RC 10.4T 90 Campervan Motorhome or Caravan refrigerator is the first ever smart compressor refrigerator which allows operation from the central control unit.

The integrated front ventilation panel of the RC 10.4T 90 is designed to fit campervans and motorhomes in general, and is especially optimized for the popular Fiat Ducato van.

A chic design adds glamour to your campervan van or van conversion project, with an elegant flat, flush-fitting door opening to a versatile 90L interior with convenient storage solutions for dairies, meat, fruit, vegetables and even frozen goods in the removable freezer compartment.

Combined with the quiet and efficient running of the RC 10.4T 90, this compressor fridge has been tested in the extreme heat of the Australian desert yet still maintains its superb cooling performance. A proven reliability that gives users the freedom to travel anywhere!

The Dometic RC 10.4T 90 has full-height aluminium handles.

Specifications

  • Model- RC 10.4T 90
  • Model on Label- RC10490
  • Description- 90 Litre Compressor Fridge With TFT Display
  • Technology- Compressor type
  • Input Voltage- 12 Volts DC
  • Rated Input Power- 45 Watts
  • Electronic Thermostatic Control
  • Noise Levels-(DIN60704-1 & 60704-2-14) 40 dB(A)
  • Energy consumption (12v DC@ 5-25°C) 0,43 kWh/24h 
  • Climate Class- T
  • Interior Light- Yes
  • Colour- Black

Dimensions

  • Dimensions Product Height-975mm
  • Dimensions Product Width- 420mm
  • Dimensions Product Depth- 485mm
  • Net Weight- 21.4kg
  • Fridge Storage Volume 90 Litres
  • Freezer Storage Volume- 8 Litres (Removable)
  • Gross Volume- 90 Litres

Note - this fridge is not suitable for use with the MPS 35 or MPS 50 adapter. These adapters operate at 24v, whilst this fridge requires 12v.

 

SPECIAL/SECOND AVAILABLE

(JC-SP-3373) -- Issue: Door panel has a slight warp across the front and a few cosmetic scratches.  Price: £999

(JC-SP-3365) -- Issue: Minimal cosmetic scuffs to door trim.  Price: £1220

Product Name: Dometic RC 10.4 70 Campervan Caravan Motorhome Compressor Fridge
Product Description:
Dometic RC 10.4T 70 Campervan Caravan Motorhome Compressor Fridge

Dometic RC 10.4T 70 Overview

The RC 10.4 70, is the latest elegant 10-series compressor refrigerator from Dometic

The RC10.4 70 is ideal for installation in campervans, motorhomes or boats, or indeed anywhere that ventilation presents a challenge.

The spacious interior, includes a removable freezer compartment offering convenient storage options.

On top of all that, the Dometic RC 10.4 70 has the best-in-class cooling capabilities.

Innovative Ventilation Solution

The integrated front ventilation panel of all the Dometic 10-series compressor refrigerators, enable installation without the need for an extra ventilation, and the RC 10.4 70 is no exception, requiring no external venting to the rear of the fridge.

This innovative solution makes the Dometic RC 10.4 70 perfect for Campervans, boats or for Motorhomes. In particular, the popular Fiat Ducato panel van can be retrofitted with this excellent cooling performer.

  • Thermostatic Control

Note - this fridge is not suitable for use with the MPS 35 or MPS 50 adapter. These adapters operate at 24v, whilst this fridge requires 12v.

Product Name: Hydro-Pro Inverter Type Z Swimming Pool Heat Pump
Product Description:
Hydro-Pro Swimming Pool Inverter Heat Pump

 

 

The inverter heat pump offers the ability to vary the heating capacity to suit weather conditions. Using the new automated modes, the compressor and fan speeds will be varied to reduce noise level and energy consumption by up to 50%.

Features: 

  • Energy label A
  • The heat pump Inverter provides the opportunity to automatically adjust heating capacities to suit weather conditions
  • “All seasons” model works down to -15°C
  • Quiet running with low noise rotary compressor and low noise variable speed fan motor
  • Automatic heating and cooling
  • Automatic defrost
  • Easy temperature control with LCD display
  • High efficiency, COP up to 13
  • Cabinet made of ABS
  • Titanium twisted heat exchanger resistant to salt and chlorine
  • Soft start, no voltage peaks

Product Name: Propex Heatsource HS2000 12v LPG Gas Blown Air Heater With Digital Control Panel
Product Description:
Propex Heatsource HS2000 12v LPG Gas Blown Air Heater With Digital Control Panel

Propex HS2000 Heater With Digital Control Panel

An upgraded version of the popular PROPEX HS2000 blown air LPG heater with analogue control for campervans, th Propex HS2000 Digital is suitable for use on a variety of vehicles including campervans, horseboxes, caravans and motorhomes, the Propex HS2000 Heater is a blown air heat source that functions independently of the engine.

With the ability to use either propane or butane as a fuel source,, the Propex HS2000 Heater is an automatic blown air heating system that is a clean and efficient method for heating your campervan , caravan or motorhome The Propex HS2000 uses a dependable thermostat to measure room temperature and automatically ignites and heats the room should it drop below the selected temperature (switching off when the optimal temperature is achieved).

The Propex HS2000 Heater is available for purchase in single, double or triple kits and as either a 12v or 24v model (please indicate your preferences for both in the appropriate drop down menus / boxes above, before checkout).

New Digital Control Panel

The Propex HS2000 Digital kit includes the digital thermostat in place of the older rotary dial style one.  

Digital selection of the required temperature allows precise setting to within a degree Centigrade within the 0 – 30C range.  

The HS2000 Digital Control Panel allows it to accept standard CBE mounting frames, so providing the ability to select from a range of readily available colours to suit the interior of the vehicle.

When connected to a gas only heater the thermostat offers the additional feature of a  1 – 16 hour countdown timer, selectable in one hour increments

What do you get in the different kits?

A single outlet vehicle kit (V1) contains:

  • 1 x 1 metre 60mm ducting
  • 1 x Digital Control Panel
  • 1 x 1 metre combustion inlet pipe
  • 1 x 0.75 meter Stainless Steel Exhaust pipe
  • 1 x Thermostat
  • 3.5 metres thermostat wiring harness
  • 3.5 metres 12v supply harness
  • 1 directional hot air outlet
  • 1 directional cool air return vent
  • hose clips, fasteners, screws, inline fuse, instructions, drilling template

A twin outlet vehicle fitting kit (V2) contains:

  • As a V1 kit with the addition of
  • 1 x open/close vent
  • 1 x Y branch
  • Extra metre of 60mm hot air ducting
  • Extra hose clips, fasteners and screws

A three outlet vehicle fitting kit (V3) contains:

  • As V1 + V2
  • An additional Y branch
  • An additional open/close vent
  • An extra metre of 60mm ducting – so 3 metres in total
  • Extra hose clips, fasteners and screws as required.

Gas Consumption Figures

  • Gas Consumption figures (under continuous operation):
  • Average consumption 142 grams/hour
  • 3.9kg propane cylinder will last - 27.5 hours
  • 4.5kg butane 31.7 hours
  • 13kg propane 91.5 hours
  • 15kg butane 105.6 hours
  • 19kg butane 133.8 hours
Product Warranty: 12 Months
Product Availability: Propex Heatsource HS2000 is sent via next working day carrier.

Product Name: Dometic Freshjet FJX4 1500 Motorhome Caravan Air Conditioner Unit
Product Description:
Dometic FreshJet FJX4 1500 Motorhome Caravan Air Conditioner

Effective and Consistent Caravan / Campervan Air Conditioning with a Low-Key Design

Manage the temperature on your next caravaning adventure with the Freshjet FJX4 1500 Air Conditioner, an inexpensive, yet efficient Air Conditioner produced by Dometic. This Air Conditioning Unit is the entry-level model from the Dometic FreshJet product range and is compatable with small and medium sized motorhomes or caravans. It can quickly cool your motorhome / caravan in hot temperatures thanks to it's two-way air distribution system, which also helps to dehumidify the air and filter out dust particles. The Air Conditioning unit is a roof unit, so has to be fitted to the rooftop of the caravan / motorhome. The design is sleek, elegant and minimalistic, suiting any modern camper seamlessly and creating a feeling of luxury without losing any functionality.

Clean and Quality Airflow Distribution

The Dometic FreshJet FJX4 1500 Air Conditioner comes fitted with the new mechanical air distribution box, which is a light-weight and ultra-compact roof air con unit. It is ideal for recreational vehicles with insulated walls up to 5 metres in length. The new mechanical design is also elegantly designed to blend in with modern motorhome designs. It moves air in two directions, both front and back, and you can easily adjust the angle of the outlet fans, making it a versatile and modern Air Conditioner. The dust filter and optimised air distribution unit ensures for consistent, quiet, and clean air circulation within the caravan or motorhome.

Please note: The Dometic FreshJet FJX ADBM Control Panel is sold separately

Dometic Freshjet  FJX4 1500 Motorhome Roof Air Conditioner - Features:

  • The entry-level motorhome air conditioner in the Dometic range. Perfect for small and medium sized motorhomes
  • Cooling and Heating Functionality
  • Three operating modes: off, cooling and ventilation
  • Remote control included as standard
  • Optimised Airflow. New quiet air distribution box with powerful front and back airflow
  • Low-key and compact design makes the Air conditioner a stealthy upgrade to your campervan or motorhome
  • Re-usable dust filter, easy to clean and ensures air quality
  • Exclusive premium design - aerodynamically shaped rooftop with eye catching LED light curve 
  • Durable and robust design

Dometic FreshJet FJX4 1500M Caravan & Motorhome Air Conditioner - Specifications:

  • Best suited for caravans, campervans or motorhomes with insulated walls up to 5 metres in length
  • Roof installation in recreational caravans, campervans and motorhomes only
  • Can be retro-fitted as a replacement for an existing 400 x 400 roof vent or roof cut-out. Please check compatibility before retro-fitting, key factors to consider include: roof vent location and roof space
  • Cooling Capacity: 1500 Watts
  • Available in either black (sku: 9600050998) or white (sku: 9600050999)
  • Please note that when ordering the black version, the interior will be white, and only the roof top box will be in black.
  • External Dimensions (W x H x D mm): 702 x 225 x 752
  • Internal ADB Dimensions (W x H x D mm): 518 x 59 x 579
  • This product must be installed by a Dometic approved installer, to not do so will affect the warranty on the product.
Product Warranty: 2 Years
Product Availability: In stock & sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Name: Dometic RF62 Portable Camping and Caravan Awning Fridge
Product Description:
Dometic RF62 Portable Camping and Caravan Awning Fridge

Replacing the Dometic RF60 portable camping awning fridge as the newer version, the Dometic RF62 continues to be a dynamic portable camping and caravan awning fridge.

Offering full flexibility through function on 3 power options, the Dometic RF62 awning fridge has adjustable shelves and runs on 12v DC, 230v AC and LPG gas to suit your power availability and storage needs.

The Dometic RF-62 portable camping awning fridge has the capacity to keep your food essentials, drinks (and added luxuries!) cool, with 56 litres worth of space provided for use, and also features a locking door (with vent) to keep your goods secure while in transit.

Thanks to its silent operations you needn’t worry about the Dometic RF62 portable camping awning fridge disturbing your sleep or a well rewarded bit of quiet time, and with its thermostat temperature regulation you can be sure that this outstanding portable fridge will always achieve the desired temperature regardless of the influences of changing weather.

Product Description:
Dometic RML 10.4T 3 Way Campervan Motorhome Fridge Freezer

Overview

The new generation of slim tower absorption refrigerators from DOMETIC give you unrivalled convenience, automatic selection of the energy source (12 V, 230 V or gas), a door that opens to the left AND right, and a versatile interior with removable, double-hinged freezer compartments.

Tall, slim and functional, the Dometic RML 10.4T absorption refrigerator offers a generous capacity of 133 litres.

The 10.4 T's functional VG Fresh lid with adjustable humidity control keeps food in your crisper compartment fresh for longer, while also serving as an additional storage shelf.

Simply use one of the two full-length aluminium handles to open the patented double-hinged door left and right.

The freezer compartment can also be opened left or right and is easily removed if you need more space for refrigerated items.

Clear, Integrated Display

The stylish integrated TFT display ensures optimal readability of refrigerator settings, provides "Best in class" cooling capabilities, and is easily controlled with its ergonomic knob.

Aerodynamically shaped

Hydro-Pro Inverter Swimming Pool Heat Pump
Product Description:
Hydro-Pro Inverter Swimming Pool Heat Pump

The Hydro-Pro Inverter Type Z heat pump features R32 refrigerant (single phase models only). The Inverter Type Z will quietly heat your swimming pool throughout the year the Hydro Pro Type Z works by absorbing heat from the surrounding air and transferring the heat to your pool or pond water.

Features:

  • R32 models, better for the environment, more efficient and safer
  • Inverter technology, suitable for pool heating all year round
  • Up to 13kW of heat to your pool for every 1kW of energy used
  • Quiet running, anti-vibration feet, corrosion resistant ABS case
  • User friendly controls with programmable temperature
  • 50mm (1½ inch) water connections, reverse defrost cycle
  • Two-year parts & labour warranty, requires professional electrical connection
  • Wi-Fi ready, smartphone control, (optional module required)

R32 Refrigerant

Single phase versions of the Hydro Pro heat pumps contain R32 refrigerant, this refrigerant passes through the evaporator where it absorbs heat from the surrounding air and becomes a gas, the gas passes through the compressor where it becomes a very hot gas and then the heat exchange occurs in the condenser where the heat from the gas is transferred to your pool water and the cooled refrigerant becomes a liquid again. Currently the refrigerant used in swimming pool heat pumps is R410A.

Inverter Technology

Inverter heat pumps use a variable speed compressor motor, the motor speeds up and slows down as needed to achieve and maintain the required temperature, the result is that the desired temperature will be reached more quickly and maintained more efficiently than a fixed speed motor.

Sizing your heat pump

When sizing a heat pump for a customer’s pool, the manufacturers maximum pool size is always our starting point, not the determining factor, whilst we carry the manufacturers specifications on our website, we do not recommend a particular heat pump based just on pool size.

The heat pump we recommend for your pool will always be based on factors including pool type, location, usage, insulation, whether the pool is covered when not in use, your expected swimming season and ultimately the temperature you would like to achieve.

Positioning your heat pump

Hydro-Pro Inverter Type Z heat pumps should always be installed outside, the diagram below shows the manufacturer recommended spacing around the horizontal and vertical heat pumps for the adequate circulation of air.

Restrictions on air flow around a heat pump such as dense vegetation or solid surfaces such as sheds, fences or walls will lead to a drop in efficiency and heating ability, it especially important that cooled air can be properly dispersed away from the unit.
