Product Name: Iconica 1000W 12V Hybrid Pure Sine Wave Inverter 40a MPPT Charge Controller 20a Mains Battery Charger
Product Description:
ICONICA 1000W 12V HYBRID PURE SINE WAVE INVERTER WITH 40A MPPT SOLAR CONTROLLER AND 20A MAINS CHARGER

Overview

The Iconica 1000W 12V Hybrid Inverter intelligently combines the functions of a 1000W pure sine wave inverter, 40A MPPT solar charge controller and a 20A smart battery charger in one single portable unit.

The IC-BM1000 accepts input from up to 500 watts of solar panels, mains power, generator and a Leisure battery - either from a single or combination of input sources.

In addition to its unique hybrid capability, this innovative inverter features advanced communication functions, along with a menu full of highly customisable settings.

Primary Functions

1. 1000W 12V Pure sine wave inverter: 

This feature converts 12v DC current into 230V AC mains electricity, to run various household appliances such as a TV, laptop, lighting, fans etc.

The Iconica IC-BM1000 is able to generate 1000VA of continuous power with a strong peak power handling capability of up to 2000VA (to start appliances with electric motors).

This inverter is a pure sine wave type, which easily surpasses modified sine wave inverters in terms of efficiency and compatibility with a wider range of appliances.

2. Inbuilt 40A MPPT solar charge controller: 

This Feature is a high efficiency MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking) controller which regulates the input from the solar panels to the batteries or to load

The Iconica IC-BM1000 has a full range of safety functions including protection against overcharging of batteries, overheating of system, reverse current etc.

The MPPT controller operates at up to 98% efficiency to extract the maximum possible power from the solar array.

3. Enhanced 20A Smart battery charger: 

This Feature is designed to enable safe and efficient unattended charging of a battery from a mains power source or generator, with full overcharge protection and multiple charging stages.

Additional Smart Features

The Iconica 1000W 12V hybrid inverter boasts many unique features, providing enhanced functionality over standard inverters.

These include:

Output source priority: This intelligent feature allows the user to set output source preferences(solar/ battery power/ mains input or a generator) for the AC load output of the inverter. This menu includes several options for varying conditions and scenarios, e.g. which source of energy is given priority for the AC output if solar power is insufficient/ if battery voltage is too low/ if mains is unavailable, etc.

Battery charging priority: A wide selection of battery charging priority options are available. For instance, the user can choose to charge the battery using solar power only/ using a combination of solar power and mains power/ from mains power only etc.

A range of highly customisable settings: The parameters for this inverter can be personalised to an exceptionally specific degree via the user-friendly interface. At the touch of a button, the user can customise parameters such as the AC input range, battery type, max charging current, specific high/low voltage disconnect points (and preferred charging source upon reconnection), the duration and voltage of each charging stage, auto-restart options, power saving mode, overload bypass, battery equalization stage characteristics and so on. There are also options for managing operational features such as the audible alarm and backlight settings. 

Illuminated LCD screen: Displays vital statistics which are easily changeable by use of the up/down keys. This information includes: status and mode, input/output voltage, frequency, battery voltage, load power and percentages, charge and discharge current etc.

Advanced communication options: The inverter is supplied with a PC connection cable and PC software for convenient viewing of important system information, such as:  solar/ battery/ AC voltage, charging current, battery capacity etc. Detailed data logs are also available to view and export to PDF/ Excel formats. This inverter also has the potential to send data to an online user portal using a Wi-Fi or 4g Connection Kit (purchased separately).

By connecting via either of these two methods, the user will unlock access to exclusive features such as SMS / email status updates for the inverter, remote system monitoring from any location and much more.

Auto restart function: When overload or overheating occurs, the inverter will disconnect the load appliances, and automatically reconnect once safe conditions are detected. The inbuilt fan is helps to maintain an optimal operational temperature.

Intelligent cooling design: The IC-CM1000 inverter uses predictive fan logic based on performance and temperature (1 or 2 fans operating at a time, with variable speeds) to prevent over-heating of the components. 

Compatibility

The Iconica IC-BM1000 hybrid inverter charger is suitable for 12V flooded and sealed GEL/AGM lead-acid batteries with pre-defined charging programs. A user-defined battery type with numerous customisable settings is also available for charging other lead acid batteries.

Iconica IC-BM1000 Specifications

  • Nominal battery voltage: 12V
  • MPPT operating voltage range: 15V – 80V
  • Maximum mains AC charging current: 20A
  • Peak efficiency: 93%
  • Output waveform: Pure sine wave
  • Maximum solar input power: 500W
  • Surge power: 2000VA
  • Maximum solar charging current: 40A
  • Continuous power output: 1000W / 1000VA
  • Supplied with: 1.5m AC power cable with 3-pin UK plug, PC connection cable, and PC Software

Dimensions

  • 320mm x 225mm x 88mm
  • Weight 5kg

Certikin Pea Gravel Swimming Pool Filter Media

Pea Gravel is commonly used in commercial swimming pool and spa filters.

  • Ideally used with no more than a 1" layer of pea gravel.
  • Pea Gravel helps support the filter laterals from the weight of the sand.
  • Pea gravel will filter out and separate the sand from the water before reaching the lateral system.
  • Swimming pool pea gravel helps stop any anaerobic bacteria from forming underneath the lateral system.
  • Pool filter pea gravel provides more room for a smoother flow of water after it has passed through the sand.
  • Packaged in 25kg bags.

Product Name: Quicksat Fully Automatic Satellite Dome for Campervan Caravan Motorhome
Product Description:
Quicksat Fully Automatic Satellite Dome For Campervan Caravan Motorhome

Satellite TV at the push of a button

The Quicksat Dome works by simply pressing a button.  The weather protected antenna will automatically find the selected satellite within 1-2 minutes, and enables reception when parked.  Ideal for receiving satellite TV in your Campervan Caravan or Motorhome.

Ideal for roof mounting

The streamlined aerodynamic construction of the QuickSAT Dome is ideal for mounting on the roof of a Campervan, Caravan or Motorhome, and it takes up very little space.  The easy alignment function is also a key feature that is built into the QuickSAT Dome when selecting your desired Satellite, thanks to the integrated GPS module driven by the remote control supplied.

Your Favourite Channels From Across Europe

Using the remote control, you can quickly select various satellites from Astra 1 to Astra 4, Eutelsat and even Hotbird.  Select Astra 2 to be able to watch all of your favourite UK TV channels in the comfort of your own campervan, including BBC, ITV and Channel 4.   The QuickSAT Dome operates independently and can be used with any satellite receiver or a television with a satellite receiver built in.

Two Models

The Quicksat comes in two models, the QSA-D55 (Single LNB) and the QSA-D55-2 (Twin LNB) select from the dropdown menu.

Supported Satellites

  • Astra 1 (19.2 ° East)
  • Astra 2 (28.2 ° East)
  • Astra 3 (23.5 ° East)
  • Astra 4 (4.8 ° East)
  • Hotbird (13 ° East)
  • Thor (0.8 ° West)
  • Eutelsat 5 West A (5? ° West)
  • Eutelsat 9A (9 ° East)

Dome Dimensions

  • Diameter: 797mm
  • Height:     300mm
  • Weight      9.6 kg 

Control Unit Dimensions

Product Name: Iconica 1000W 12v Hybrid Pure Sine Wave Inverter 50 Amp PWM Solar Charge Controller 20 Amp Mains Battery Charger
Product Description:
Iconica 1000W 12v Hybrid Pure Sine Wave Inverter 50 Amp Solar Charge Controller 20 Amp Mains Battery Charger

Overview

The Iconica 1000W 12V Hybrid Inverter intelligently combines the functions of a 1000W pure sine wave inverter, 50 amp PWM solar charge controller and a 20A smart battery charger in one single portable unit.

The IC-BP1000-12 accepts input from up to 600 watts of solar panels, mains power, generator and a Leisure battery - either from a single or combination of input sources.

In addition to its unique hybrid capability, this innovative inverter features advanced communication functions, along with a menu full of highly customisable settings.

Primary Functions

1. 1000W 12V Pure sine wave inverter: 

This feature converts 12v DC current into 230V AC mains electricity, to run various household appliances such as a TV, laptop, lighting, fans etc.

The Iconica IC-BP1000-12 is able to generate 1000VA of continuous power with a strong peak power handling capability of up to 2000VA (to start appliances with electric motors).

This inverter is a pure sine wave type, which easily surpasses modified sine wave inverters in terms of efficiency and compatibility with a wider range of appliances.

2. Inbuilt 50A PWM Solar Charge: 

This Feature is a high efficiencyPWM controller which regulates the input from the solar panels to the batteries or to load

The Iconica IC-BP1000-12 has a full range of safety functions including protection against overcharging of batteries, overheating of system, reverse current etc.

The MPPT controller operates at up to 98% efficiency to extract the maximum possible power from the solar array.

3. Enhanced 20A Smart battery charger: 

This Feature is designed to enable safe and efficient unattended charging of a battery from a mains power source or generator, with full overcharge protection and multiple charging stages.

Additional Smart Features

The Iconica 1000W 12V hybrid inverter boasts many unique features, providing enhanced functionality over standard inverters.

These include:

Output source priority: This intelligent feature allows the user to set output source preferences(solar/ battery power/ mains input or a generator) for the AC load output of the inverter. This menu includes several options for varying conditions and scenarios, e.g. which source of energy is given priority for the AC output if solar power is insufficient/ if battery voltage is too low/ if mains is unavailable, etc.

Battery charging priority: A wide selection of battery charging priority options are available. For instance, the user can choose to charge the battery using solar power only/ using a combination of solar power and mains power/ from mains power only etc.

A range of highly customisable settings: The parameters for this inverter can be personalised to an exceptionally specific degree via the user-friendly interface. At the touch of a button, the user can customise parameters such as the AC input range, battery type, max charging current, specific high/low voltage disconnect points (and preferred charging source upon reconnection), the duration and voltage of each charging stage, auto-restart options, power saving mode, overload bypass, battery equalization stage characteristics and so on. There are also options for managing operational features such as the audible alarm and backlight settings. 

Illuminated LCD screen: Displays vital statistics which are easily changeable by use of the up/down keys. This information includes: status and mode, input/output voltage, frequency, battery voltage, load power and percentages, charge and discharge current etc.

Advanced communication options: The inverter is supplied with a PC connection cable and PC software for convenient viewing of important system information, such as:  solar/ battery/ AC voltage, charging current, battery capacity etc. Detailed data logs are also available to view and export to PDF/ Excel formats. This inverter also has the potential to send data to an online user portal using a Wi-Fi or 4g Connection Kit (purchased separately).

By connecting via either of these two methods, the user will unlock access to exclusive features such as SMS / email status updates for the inverter, remote system monitoring from any location and much more.

Auto restart function: When overload or overheating occurs, the inverter will disconnect the load appliances, and automatically reconnect once safe conditions are detected. The inbuilt fan is helps to maintain an optimal operational temperature.

Intelligent cooling design: The IC-BP1000-12 inverter uses predictive fan logic based on performance and temperature (1 or 2 fans operating at a time, with variable speeds) to prevent over-heating of the components. 

Compatibility

The Iconica IC-BP1000-12 hybrid inverter charger is suitable for 12V flooded and sealed GEL/AGM lead-acid batteries with pre-defined charging programs. A user-defined battery type with numerous customisable settings is also available for charging other lead acid batteries.

Iconica IC-BM1000 Specifications

  • Nominal battery voltage: 12V
  • PWM operating voltage range: 15V – 80V
  • Maximum mains AC charging current: 20A
  • Peak efficiency: 93%
  • Output waveform: Pure sine wave
  • Maximum solar input power: 500W
  • Surge power: 2000VA
  • Maximum solar charging current: 50A
  • Continuous power output: 1000W / 1000VA
  • Supplied with: 1.5m AC power cable with 3-pin UK plug, PC connection cable, and PC Software

Dimensions

  • 320mm x 225mm x 88mm
  • Weight 5kg

Product Name: Rangemaster Wi-Fi Range Extender Kit for Campervan Campervan Motorhome
Product Description:
Rangemaster Wi-Fi Range Extender Kit for Campervan Campervan Motorhome

Overview

The RangeMaster Campervan Router package includes WiFi King long-range wireless outdoor antenna and a high power router. This Router package allows you to share the boosted WiFi signal with any devices nearby that support WiFi from your campervan, motorhome or caravan.

The RangeMaster Router is designed to give you a better signal over a long distance compared to standard, store-bought Wi-Fi products as the WiFi King antenna is spefically designed for Campervan use. As well as this, it comes complete with a waterpoof antenna, suction mount and shielded 5M cable to protect against any power loss. The WiFi King allows connection to an 802.11n wireless network at up to 150 Mbps in the 2.4GHz frequency. 

Your new boosted WiFi signal can be shared between any device that supports WiFi including Windows, Apple, Linux PCs, iPhones, iPads, Android phones and tablets, Windows Phone and Blackberries.

The Rangemaster Wi-Fi kit is easily fastened to your campervan, motorhome or caravan using the high power suction mount that comes included. The router also comes with a 12 volt cigarette lighter power lead, 240 volt mains adapter, a 12v merit type and a 12V Clipsal type power lead included.

Key Features:

  • Works with any device that has WiFi
  • 2.4GHz frequency band
  • Works with 802.11b/g/n networks
  • Supports wireless data encryption with 64/128-bit WEP, WPA, WPA2, TKIP and AES functions.
  • Works with 802.11b/g/n networks
  • 5 metre cable
  • Light weight and easy to mount
  • Omnidirectional antenna
  • Supports high speed data rate up to 150Mbps
  • Range up to 5 Km in ideal conditions
  • High power WiFi router
  • Outdoor long range waterproof antenna

Kit Includes:

  • WiFi King Waterproof USB Adapter
  • WiFi King Waterpoof Antenna
  • 5 Metre shielded USB cable
  • RangeMaster Router
  • Suction mounting bracket
  • 12V cigarette lighter power lead
  • Mains adapter
  • Instructions

Product Name: Iconica 3KW Uninterrupted Power Supply With 400ah 12V Gel Batteries
Product Description:
Iconica 3KW Uninterrupted Power Supply With 400ah Of Gel Batteries For Static Caravans

Overview and Applications

The Iconica Universal Uninterrupted Power Supply (UPS) system is suitable for both mains-powered and off-grid applications where a stable and reliable source of AC power is required. Ideal for running household appliances, I.T and computer rooms, servers, commercial or other large electronic equipment, or, as a stand alone off grid solar system for up to 1200 Watts of solar input up to a max series input of 80 VDC. Perfect for static caravans for example.

Solar Power System

With the addition of up to 1200 watts of solar panels, the UPS system also supports solar power input with no additional charge control equipment required. Users can simply connect a suitable solar array to the inverter to start charging from solar power to save on electricity bills for mains connected systems, or in order to run a generator less frequently for off-grid systems.

Important

Please note: this UPS system uses an off-grid inverter. Any other AC power sources, including mains, can only be connected to the inverter input AC terminals, and should be fully isolated from the inverter output AC terminals. If the AC output of this inverter comes into contact with another source of AC power, the inverter will be damaged.

Kit includes

  • 3 Kw inverter charger
  • 2 x 100 amp hour GEL batteries
  • 1 mtr tinned copper battery cables
  • Battery Linking Cable
  • Thermal Overcurrent Circuit Breaker
  • Loose Ring Terminals For Crimping

Hybrid Inverter specifications:

  • Nominal battery voltage: 24V
  • Continuous power output: 3000W / 3000VA
  • Surge power: 6000VA
  • Output voltage: 230V AC
  • Output frequency: 50Hz /60 Hz
  • Output waveform: Pure sine wave
  • Maximum solar input power: 1200W
  • Maximum open circuit solar input voltage: 80V
  • Maximum solar charging current: 50A
  • Maximum mains AC charging current: 25A

  • Peak efficiency: 93%
  • Operating temperature: -10C to 50C
  • Supplied with a PC connection cable and PC software CD
  • Terminals for mains power connection
  • Size: 33.4 x 28.5 x 10 cm
  • Weight: 6.3 kg

 Battery specifications (per battery):

  • Nominal voltage: 12V
  • Nominal capacity: 200Ah (10h rate) / 205Ah (20h rate)

  • Self-discharging rate: <1% per month

  • Pressure control: safety valve installed

Product Name: Victron Energy Smart Shunt 500a Battery Monitor VE.Direct Compatible
Product Description:
Victron SmartShunt: Monitor Your Leisure Battery using the Victron App

About Victron SmartShunt

The Victron SmartShunt Battery Monitor (SHU050150050), is a compact and affordable battery monitor that empowers you to track your battery's health and performance with ease. Designed for modern convenience, it communicates wirelessly via Bluetooth, eliminating the need for a separate display unit and offering real-time data access on your smartphone or tablet.

Key Features

  • Wireless Monitoring: Connects seamlessly with your phone or tablet via Bluetooth, displaying vital leisure battery information through the VictronConnect app.
  • Comprehensive Data: Measures and displays battery current, voltage, and temperature, providing a holistic view of its health and performance.
  • State of Charge and Time to Go: Get valuable insights into your battery's remaining charge and estimated runtime based on current usage.
  • Historical Data Tracking: Tracks leisure battery data over time, allowing you to identify trends, diagnose potential issues, and optimize charging plans.
  • Simple Installation: Compact design and straightforward connections ensure hassle-free installation in any location.
  • Versatile Connectivity: Features a VE.Direct port for connecting to other Victron devices, enabling additional functionalities like monitoring a second battery, midpoint voltage, or temperature sensors.

Benefits

  • Enhanced Battery Health: Gain valuable insights and optimize charging practices, resulting in improved battery lifespan and performance.
  • Convenient Monitoring: Access real-time battery data from anywhere, anytime, thanks to the Bluetooth connection and VictronConnect app.
  • Simplified Setup: Eliminate the need for a dedicated display, minimizing clutter and simplifying installation.
  • Affordable Investment: Offers comprehensive battery monitoring at an accessible price point.

Things to Consider

  • Size and Current Rating: This model has a maximum current rating of 500A. For larger batteries, consider alternative options.
  • Smartphone/Tablet Compatibility: Requires a Bluetooth-enabled smartphone or tablet with the Victron Connect app installed.
  • Part: SHU050150050

The Victron Smart Shunt offers a convenient and affordable solution for monitoring your battery bank's health and performance. Its wireless connectivity, comprehensive data display, and historical tracking capabilities make it a valuable asset for optimizing battery life and ensuring reliable off-grid power.

38 Litre Mid Sized Camping Cool Box

The Dometic CFF45 is the latest addition to their powered cool box range and features a stylish, modern design, a double hinged lid and an efficient interior storage layout suitable for all outdoor activities including camping, caravan and motorhome use. Designed with outdoor enthusiasts in mind, the CFF 45 portable cool box is the perfect upgrade for the traditional ice chest. The generous insulation built in to Dometic's CFF45 ensures excellent cooling performance.

Product Features:

  • Spacious Storage fits wine bottles and standard 1.5L bottles upright
  • Innovative double sided opening lid
  • Strong handles glass filled nylon & steel handle for reliable use
  • Dimmable digital display with built in LED control system displaying cooling temperature
  • Energy efficient design provides fast and excellent cooling and freezing, even in extremely high outside temperatures
  • Single compartment can be used as a fridge or a freezer
  • Generous 38 litres of storage
  • Can be set between +10 °C and –18 °C, with the ability to run at –18 °C at ambient temperatures of up to +32 °C
  • Compact design ensures excellent portability
  • Dual power AC DC ports
  • Robust build
  • Interior LED light

Product Name: Avtex Tourer Three Sat Nav Caravan Club Edition
Product Description:
Avtex Tourer Three Satellite Navigation for Motorhome Users

Personalise your route to suit your vehicle with the Avtex Garmin Sat Nav 

The Avtex Tourer Three satellite navigation system has been designed in conjunction with sat nav industry leaders Garmin. It is packed full of features specifically designed for caravan, campervan and motorhome users - simply enter the size of your vehicle or caravan, and the Tourer satnav will create a route to your destination avoiding height, width, and weight restricted roads. It will also provide you with warnings about sharp bends or steep hills along the way. 

With Caravan Club Integration

The Avtex Tourer 3 Sat Nav Caravan and Motorhome Club Edition has exclusive access to the Caravan and Motorhome Club's sites for navigation, allowing users to search, filter and view all the best Caravan and Motorhome Club sites. It can also suggest places you may want to visit en-route, and can provide alternate routes to avoid traffic along the way.

Lifetime map updates

The Avtex Tourer Three Sat Nav is designed to simplify navigation with motorhomes, caravans and campers. It is preloaded with detailed maps of 45 European countries and includes free lifetime map updates, including information on road restrictions, such as bridge heights. The Avtex Tourer Two allows users to input the specs of their motorhome to create a camper profile, enabling the sat nav to find the most efficient route across the UK and Europe.

Avtex Tourer 3 T3 SatNav Features:

  • Custom camper routing for the size and weight of your motorhome or caravan
  • Road warnings for bridge heights, weight limits, sharp curves, steep grades and more
  • Shows elevation and possible steep grades along your route
  • Directory of more than 9000 ACSI camp sites
  • Points of interest for The Caravan and Motorhome Club
  • Highlights Trendy Places and Local Spots en route
  • Trip advisor traveller ratings included
  • Birds-eye view satellite navigation to help you find your pitch
  • Find camp sites with preferred amenities
  • Shows camp sites, food and fuel stations along your route
  • Easily change your route to include preferred roads or cities, just by touching the screen
  • Garmin live traffic via DAB finds the fastest traffic route with one minute update cycles
  • Voice command enabled so you keep your hands on the wheel
  • Bluetooth technology and hands-free calling
  • Garmin Real Directions guides using landmarks and traffic lights
  • Active Lane Guidance & helpful PhotoReal Junction Views. Prepares you to drive through an exit or interchange with confidence
  • Free Smartphone Link app that allows your Garmin camper sat nav to receive real time information such as traffic, mobile safety cameras, weather and much more
  • 6.95” Edge to Edge Touchscreen HD Screen
  • Wi-Fi Compatible

Dimensions:

  • W6.8” x H3.9” x D0.7” (17.3 x 9.9 x 1.9 cm)
  • Weight: 239.6g
Product Warranty: Avtex Sat Nav systems come with a 12 month warranty
Product Availability: Avtex Tourer T3 are dispatched on a 2-3 day delivery

Product Name: Vango Montelena Inflatable Caravan Air Awning
Product Description:
Vango Montelena Caravan Air Awning

AirBeam Inflatable Awning Tent

The Vango Montelena Air Awning is a quick pitch, traditionally shaped touring caravan awning. The addition of skylights alongside Vango's diamond pro windows provide a light, bright and airy living space for caravanners. The large side doors can be removed for an optional annex extension, perfect for additional storage or accomodating friends and family when they come to stay. The optional annexe features a Light-out inner for a darker bedroom and a rear annexe door for wheeling muddy bikes in for storage.

Vango Montelena Caravan Awning Product Features:

  • Vango's Sentinel Luxe fabric awning is fully wind and waterproof.
  • Vango ColourLok technology for UV resistance.
  • AirBeam SuperBeams have larger diameter beams for added stability.
  • The Vango Montelena caravan awning features Vango's Draught Seal System which creates a tight seal between the awning and caravan.
  • SkyTrack II System enables you to easily attach lighting, storage or SkyLiners to the caravan awning tent.
  • Montelena awning has Diamond Pro Windows which are thicker than our diamond clear windows and give superior insulation and clearer views.
  • Skylight windows.
  • Multi-option privacy Zip Curtains.
  • PVC Mud Strip
  • Removable doors which can be adjusted to be fully or half open.
  • Covered Entry.
  • Mesh Side Door fitted with internal mesh panel for bug free ventilation.
  • Available in two sizes: 330 and 400

Vango Montelena Caravan Awning Includes:

  • Vango Montelena inflatable AirAwning
  • SkyLiners
  • Foam draught excluder pads
  • Storm straps
  • Bracer beams
  • PVC draught skirt
  • 2 x wheel arch covers
  • Steel rock pegs, mallet and carry bag
  • Double action pump
  • Easy pack carry bag

Dimensions for Vango Montelena 330 AirAwning:

  • Total weight: 32.8kg
  • Canvas weight: 22.6kg
  • Packed: L78 x W53 x H50cm
  • Kadar length: 55 + 330 + 55cm
  • Pitching Time: Approx. 20 mins

Dimensions for Vango Montelena 400 AirAwning:

  • Total weight: 37.1kg
  • Canvas weight: 24.9kg
  • Packed: L78 x W54 x H48cm
  • Kadar length: 55 + 400 + 55cm
  • Pitching Time: Approx. 20 mins

Optional Extras Available to Order Seperately:

  • Carpet CP213 (Montelena 330) or CP212 (Montelena 400)
  • Front mesh door MD005 (Montelena 330) and MD004 (Montelena 400)
  • Side mesh doors MD100
Product Warranty:
The Vango Montelena Air Awning comes with a 2 year manufacturers warranty which can be extended to 3 years by registering the product with Vango. 
This Vango awning is designed for touring use and is not designed for static or long-term seasonal pitching as extensive exposure to UV light will cause accelerated fabric degradation. UV degradation is not covered under the warranty. However, under normal holiday use your awning will give long service.

Product Name: Vango Vienna 400 All Season Caravan Air Awning
Product Description:
Vango Vienna 400 All Season Caravan AirAwning

Seasonal Inflatable AirBeam Awning Tent

The Vango Vienna 400 all season air awning is a traditionally shaped inflatable tent with contemporary styling. The Vienna AirAwning is a luxury residential awning designed for a permanent pitch. Its quick pitch, easy inflatable design makes it well suited to touring caravans as well as sited ones. Designed to offer great space for the whole family, its large windows and skylights create a bright, airy interior. Relax on your caravanning holiday and explore the natural beauty around your campsite with the Vienna 400 Caravan Awning from Vango.

Seasonal Awnings:

The Vienna AirBeam caravan awning is suitable for extended or seasonal pitching from April to October. During very strong winds or snowfall Vango recommend that you take your awning down.

Vango Vienna All Season Awning Product Details:

  • Pre-angled AirBeams for effective bracing against winds.
  • Vango Sentinel TenCate residential fabric is moisture regulating to reduce condensation.
  • All season residential awning tents are waterproof, weather-resistant and durable.
  • Larger diameter SuperBeams provide additional structure and stability.
  • Vango draught seal system creates a tight seal between the awning and caravan minimising draughts.
  • Vango SkyTrack II System for attaching lighting, storage or SkyLiners.
  • Diamond pro windows provide additional insulation and clearer views than standard tent windows.
  • Mesh side door fitted with internal mesh panel for bug-free ventilation.
  • Removable front and side doors can be adjusted to be fully or half open.
  • Skylight windows create a light and airy living area.
  • The Vango Vienna caravan awning features colour fast technology to reduce fading.
  • Multi-option privacy zip curtains
  • PVC Mud Strip.
  • Covered entry.

Product Name: Falcon 22 or 24 inch Campervan TV With Satellite DVD Bluetooth And Freeview***Nick F Under Construction*** 13th March
Product Description:
Falcon 22 or 24 inch Campervan TV With Satellite DVD Bluetooth And Freeview

Product Description

The Falcon 22" or 24" range of travel televisions are the sleekest most powerful models yet, perfect for campervan, caravan or motorhome. The Falcon is a complete entertainment centre in one compact lightweight unit, the vivid LED wide screen brings a clear picture, and has class leading viewing angles so you won’t miss a thing.

All your favourite programming

With built in tuners for DVB-T2 (Freeview) and DVB-S2 (Satellite Free To Air) you get the choice of SD or HD broadcasts from digital terrestrial TV and radio channels, or satellite so you can enjoy channels such as BBC One HD, BBC Two HD, ITV HD and Channel 4HD wherever you are, just plug in a TV aerial or connect a satellite dish. As if that’s not enough, the TV also features a built in DVD/CD player and USB for playback of video, audio or picture files and recording and pausing of live TV, simply plug in a USB stick or hard drive.

Triple voltage

Designed to work on 12 volt and 24 volt power using the dual cigarette lighter/hella style power lead as well as from mains power using the included mains adapter.

The Falcon 22 or 24" campervan caravan or motorhome TV's are ultra-low power, consuming less than 22 watts when on and under 0.5W in standby mode.

Key Features

  • Bluetooth audio to headphones or soundbar
  • Ultra low power consumption
  • Compact design
  • Full HD 1080p
  • Triple Voltage: 12V, 24V, 240V Mains
  • Free 3 year warranty
  • Comes with stand, also VESA wall mount compatible
  • Freeview HD built in DVB-T2
  • HD Satellite decoder built in DVB-S2
  • Record and pause live TV

Technical Specifications

  • Lightweight, compact all-in-one design
  • 22″ or 24" Widescreen Full HD LED screen
  • Built in Bluetooth audio for Bluetooth Soundbar or headphones
  • 2 x HDMI inputs
  • PC/VGA Input
  • Mini AV input
  • Mini YPbPr input
  • 2 x USB 2.0 input (5V, 500mA)
  • Headphone output
  • Contrast ratio 3000:1
  • Viewing angle 178° horizontal, 178° vertical
  • Response time 5ms
  • Stereo speakers
  • Infra red remote control

Dimensions

  • Dimensions without stand: 503(W) x 52 (D) x 305 (H) mm
  • Dimensions with stand: 503 (W) x 154 (D) x 343 (H) mm
  • Weight 3.5Kg with stand
  • Compatible with 100 x 100 mm VESA wall mount
  • Headphone output

  • Falcon 24" JLS-TV24S4

The S4 DBTS range of travel televisions from Falcon Technologies are the sleekest most powerful models yet, a complete entertainment centre in one compact lightweight unit. The bright LED widescreen brings vivid pictures and has class leading viewing angles so you won’t miss a thing.

Product Name: Vango Magra Air Drive Away Awning Bundle
Product Description:
Vango Magra Air Drive Away Awning Bundle 

AirBeam Campervan Awning Package for VW T6 or Similar Size Vans

The Vango Magra is a versatile and spacious inflatable drive-away awning designed for campervans and van conversions. It is designed to fit a VW T6 and similar size campervans and features a front and back entrance, making it adaptable for both left and right main van doors. The awning offers a generous living space with ample headroom, allowing you to comfortably relax or dine within. The Magra awning front door has an eyebrow canopy to keep you dry if it's raining whilst the back has a sweeping canopy ideal for muddy shoes and creating a more usable space at the back of your campervan. 

Built with ease of use in mind, the Vango Magra awning features Vango's AirBeam technology, which allows for quick and easy inflation without the need for poles. The sturdy structure offers great stability, even in windy conditions. Its large front and side windows allow for panoramic views and plenty of natural light, while the zip-up side doors provide flexible access and ventilation options. It includes a fully sealed groundsheet to keep the inside dry and protected.

With its modern design, excellent build quality, and practical features, the Vango Magra Awning provides comfort and convenience for outdoor camping adventures.

Vango Magra Drive Away Awning Product Features:

  • Fully sewn in awning groundsheet
  • Low Level vents
  • TBS II tension band system ensures your Vango Magra awning performs in adverse weather conditions
  • Zipped cable entry point to protect mains inlet
  • Two mesh doors for bug free ventilation
  • Diamond clear windows maximise light and visibility to provide a bright and airy space
  • Multiple attachment methods including pre-attached 6mm kador, over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole and clamp
  • Two covered porch entrances at front and back of vehicle
  • Zipped cable entry point to protect mains inlet
  • Vango Magra awning features zipped privacy curtains
  • Flat entry avoids trip hazard and ensures easy access for pushchairs and wheelchairs
  • Sentinel Sport lightweight yet strong and waterproof fabric.

 Vango Magra Awning Bundle Includes:

  • Universal carpet
  • Groundsheet protector  
  • Steel pegs, mallet and double action pump with pressure dial
  • Easy pack carry bag
  • 10 x skyhooks
  • Skyliners to reduce condensation and as a thermal barrier

Dimensions:

  • Total Weight: 22.5kg
  • Canvas Weight: 16.35kg
  • Packed Dimensions: L75 x W41 x H40cm
  • Kador Length: 250cm
Product Warranty: 3 Year warranty when registered with Vango.

Vango Tolga Driveaway Airbeam Campervan Awning Bundle

VW T5/T6 Size AirBeam Awning, Bedroom and Groundsheet Protector

The Vango Tolga Drive Away AirBeam awning is designed for VW T5, T6 and similar size campervans and conversions. Using Vango's AirBeam technology the Tolga drive away awning is simple and fast to inflate, combined with Sentinel Sport fabric which is strong durable and waterproof and uses ColourLok technology to reduce the effects of UV. The large front door on the Vango Tolga AirBeam Awning ensures that when the sun shines, you can roll back the door and catch those sunrays, but with the option to zip close the front mesh door to keep out the bugs. The connecting tunnel has a door at each side and provides ample storage space for bikes and muddy boots. Vango's Tolga drive away campervan awning is perfect for couples and families on their adventures.

Product Name: Vango Lismore 450 Poled Family Tent Package
Product Description:
Vango Lismore 450 Poled Tent

4 Person Family Camping Tent Package

The newly designed Vango Lismore 450 tent is a spacious multi zone tunnel tent ideal for spending quality time camping with family and friends. The 4 person model is ideally suited to couples and small families and the 6 person tent is perfect for those looking for a bit more space. This great value tent comes as a package which includes the tent and a footprint which helps extend the life of your tent by keeping it clean and protecting the groundsheet from stones and sharp objects.

 

The 4 man version features a comfortable bedroom with privacy divider, a spacious living area for relaxing and an additional area that can be opened up to extend the living area or opened up in front to create a covered porch area. The front awning door can be used in three positions; fully open, semi-open or closed. The side door has the option to be used as a canopy with a set of optional king poles (sold separately). The Lismore 450 is a versatile tent with ample space on camping trips with family and friends.

 

This family camping tent features nightfall bedrooms to help reduce early morning light and help provide a good nights sleep. Inside the bedroom are storage pockets, ideal for stowing torches and mobile phones.

 

Easy access and spacious design

With a built in awning at the front and a drop down door step for easy access with prams or wheelchairs, the Vango Lismore provides greater camping opportunities for all. You can enhance the luxurious feel of your tent package by selecting the bundle option that includes a Universal Carpet designed to fit either the 4 or 6 person tent perfectly.

Vango Lismore camping tent features:

  • Large unzippable front door for maximum space and convenience
  • Vango Sentinel Active is a lightweight polyester fabric that is waterproof to 3000mm HH rating
  • Diamond clear windows with toggled privacy curtains
  • Lantern hanging points and cable entry for easy electric hook-up on camp sites
  • Pre-angled Vango PowerFlex fibreglass poles
  • Vango nightfall bedrooms
  • Waterproof groundsheet
  • High visibility guy lines
  • The Lismore tent also comes with a Vango easy pack carry bag

Royal Welford 4 Person Family Tunnel Tent

Royal Welford Family Camping Tent

Ideal for family camping, this Welford 4 person tent is perfect for getting out in the great outdoors. This tunnel tent design is sturdy during windy weather and with a 3000mm hydrostatic head flysheet, offers great waterproofness too. Another great feature of tunnel tent designs is a generous headroom throughout the length of the tent. Choose from a fibreglass poled or inflatable tube version, both with quick pitching times so you can make the most of your time away.

From the tough seam sealed polyester fabric, to storage pockets and mesh covered doors for improved air circulation, the Royal Welford Tent has all the functionality needed for family camping. Also, if you want to have mains power inside your tent, the Welford 4 Person tent has a specific cable entry point along with a lantern hanging point for making the most of those late evenings of camping. For added peace of mind during the evening or night, the guylines are reflective.

Uniquely shaped 8 Person Poled Tent

From tall sides offering 360° views and generous headroom, this Coleman Cortes Octagon 8 tent is perfect for campers seeking a glamping experience or for festival goers looking for a spacious group tent. With ingenious design features like a hinged door and external curtains, this is certainly a tent to stand out on the festival field or campsite.

Available in a choice of colours

With three colour options available, simply choose the Cortes Octagon 8 Tent to your liking from the option set above. Grey externally zipped curtains provide privacy when needed and 'no-see-um' mesh on the inside allows plenty of air flow whilst keeping bugs out for added comfort.

Simple pitch design

In order to make pitching the Cortes Octagon 8 tent as simple as possible, Coleman provide colour coded poles to ensure a quick pitch every time. Combining this along with the sewn-in groundsheet and anchor points, pitching can be completed within minutes.

The Vango Skye tent features a side entry door and a spacious porch area perfect for storing muddy boots and camping kit. This four man tent features Vango's Nightfall bedrooms which block out early morning light giving you a great nights sleep on your camping trip. Product Name: Vango Longleat II 800 XL 8 Person Tent
Product Description:
Vango Longleat 800XL Airbeam Family Tent 

Large Inflatable 8 Person Camping Tent 

The Vango Longleat II 800XL Airbeam is a large 8 person inflatable tent featuring a mirrored tent tunnel layout. Each separate bedroom pod sleeps up to 4 people offering exceptional balance between living and sleeping space whilst providing greater privacy than the standard tent design. Vango Longleat tent also includes large diamond clear windows with toggled privacy curtains allowing light to fill your living area during the day as well as cover with the roll-away curtains at night. The fully sewn in groundsheet ensures draughts and bugs are kept out. Vango Longleat 800XL Airbeam Tent also features an optional side awning to create extra internal space when needed, perfect for adding space for socialising or to store accessories. Tent also includes an easypack carry bag to easily store and pack away your tent made from 15% more material and 50% more volume. 

Vango Longleat II 800XL Airbeam Tent Features:

  • All flysheet seams are factory taped which provides watertight seal
  • The Vango 800XL Tent features retardant fabrics
  • Dimond clear windows to maximise light and visibility
  • Cable entry point with tidies
  • Lantern ganging point
  • This family sized tent features a large living area and spacious standard sized bedrooms 
  • Fully sewn-in groundsheet adding to the comfort of your tent by providing a bug and draught free environment whilst camping
  • Bedroom pockets for conveniently storing your essentials
  • Vango PowerFlex fibreglass poles to create strong, light and reliable structures
  • High visibility guylines making it easy to see in low light conditions.
  • Vango Longleat features nightfall bedrooms helping reduce any early morning light for an undisturbed sleep

Product Name: Coleman Meadowood 4 Blackout Air Tunnel Tent
Product Description:
Coleman Meadowood 4 Air Blackout Family Tent

4 Person Inflatable Family Camping Tent 

The Coleman Meadowood 4 Blackout Air tent is a comfortable and easily pitched 4 person family tent ideal your next camping holiday. Featuring the simple FastPitch air pole design, that can easily be pitched by a single person, two large bedrooms and a useful living area, this is a great camping tent for short weekend breaks or extended holidays with family or friends. 

Blackout Technology Bedrooms

Featuring Coleman's exclusive Blackout Bedroom technology in this inflatable tent, the specifically designed fabric blocks daylight from the sleeping area. The Blackout material promotes a better nights sleep by keeping the bedroom area cooler and darker for longer, making sleeping that bit easier and more comfortable. A handy organiser on the bedroom wall helps to keep the tent tidy.

Sewn-in groundsheet and highly waterproof fabric

Offering a high 4000mm Hydrostatic Head material for improved protection from the rain and a UVGuard of SPF50 for added peace of mind from harmful UV rays, the Meadowood 4 Air provides the protection from the elements to make holidays more comfortable. The sewn-in groundsheet also helps to keep bugs out and prevent water ingress. The tough, fire retardant material and quick inflate and deflate air poles make for a robust and and rapidly inflatable tent. The front entrance also has a No Barrier Access to prevent trips and falls. For those sunny days, the porch also provides some additional shelter.

  • Waterproof Rating: 4000mm

Product Name: Adventurer (THC) Curved Frame Top Hung Hinged Low Profile Campervan Window - Black Blind
Product Description:
Adventurer (THC) Curved Radius Frame Top Hinged Campervan Windows - Black Blind

Black Aluminium Curved Frame Low Profile Campervan Window with Black Blinds, ideal for panel vans.

Introducing our new collection of Adventurer Curved Campervan Top Hung Windows, crafted to seamlessly blend with the contours of your van.

Curved frame explained

Many campervans and van conversions have side walls which have a slight curve running top to bottom, the Adventurer curved frame window matches the curve of your vans walls with a radius. 

Practical and Stylish

These windows feature a sleek aluminium frame and are fitted with high-quality, tinted double glazed UV resistant acrylic, ensuring both durability and optimal protection against harmful UV rays and privacy. Available in various sizes, our curved campervan windows cater to your needs.  The Adventurer curved campervan windows prioritise stability and durability by incorporating an aluminium frame and stainless steel strut rods (with the exception of the 818 x 315mm version which comes with plastic struts). These enhanced features ensure a robust structure and reliable performance for your campervan adventures.

Privacy is key

With a tinted double glazed window and pleated blind and flyscreen within a PVC frame, the Adventurer Curved Frame low profile window adds privacy and helps to keep light out. The flyscreen also helps to provide airflow yet keep bugs out.

Easy installation

A window mounting frame which follows the curvature of the campervan wall with a thickness of 25-40mm makes for easy installation on most vehicles and a wide range of window sizes in a stylish black colour will compliment most colour schemes well.  It is suggested that a timber frame is bonded to the inside of the vehicle to add rigidity to the van's sides. The timber fame can be built up from thinner strips of ply to follow the curve of the campervan's sides.

Adventurer Curved Top Hung Hinged Windows Specifications

  • Aluminium alloy flat frame finished in black
  • Double glazed acrylic window
  • UV resistant
  • Vertical Curvature radius of 5000mm
  • Double stainless steel struts (with the exception of 818 x315 frame)
  • Two handle closures
  • Pleated blind and fly screen with PVC frame
  • Wall thickness mounting size: 25-40mm frame
  • Suitable for caravan motorhome van conversion or campervan

Product Description:
Smoby Playhouse on Stilts

Garden playhouse for children who want to reach new heights!

For kids who want to go up in the world it can only be with the help of the new Smoby House on Stilts. Set at a dizzy height of 70cm you'll be able to see for miles, well maybe not miles, but definitely a few extra metres! See who's coming, what's the cat up to, from up here you'll be able to see, by the way take an oxygen mask just in case the rarefied air gets too much! The Smoby House of Stilts is also decorated with animals on the walls, making it fun, but also a pretty addition to your garden. This hut will quickly become a kids favourite place to have fun all day long!

With a half door, 3 windows, ladder and a slide:

The New Smoby House on Stilts is an explosion of excitement and fun just waiting to happen. Play hide and seek, use the sliding window shutters to spy on your friends, make a quick escape down the slide, just let children loose on this latest playhouse from Smoby and watch the fun begin. You enjoy peace of mind knowing that the playhouse is both super fun and super safe.

Other Details:

  • House size: 98 x 110 x 127 cm
  • Overall dimensions: 260 x 160 x 197 cm
  • Approx Weight: 35 Kg
  • Material: Plastic
  • Outside use: Anti-UV treated ensuring a good resistance to sunlight and better durability of colors over time.
  • Suitable for ages 2 and above.
Product Availability: In stock and sent with a Next Working Day courier service!

Product Name: Pyranha Surfjet 2.0 Sit on Top Kayak
Option Set: Pyranha Surfjet 2.0 Sit on Top Kayak colours
Product Description:
Pyranha Surfjet 2.0 Sit on Top Kayak

Pyranha Surfjet is special order for collection only. Lead time approx. 2-4 weeks 

Premium sit on top kayak 

The Pyranha Surf Jet 2.0 is a premium recreational sit on top kayak. The Surfjet SOT is designed as a family fun kayak, perfect for exploring the coast, playing in the surf or as a swimming platform. it is ideally suited to the beach, lake or river. Alternatively, turn your boat into a fishing kayak by adding an optional fish on top kit. At just 8 foot 9 inches long the Surf jet kayak is easy to transport and store.

Pyranha Surfjet sit on top kayak features:

  • The perfect blend of surf performance and stability.
  • The Surf Jet 2 has a moulded-in child seat at the front bow, facing the paddler.
  • Moulded-in foot and heel rests for different sized paddlers.
  • The Slip resistant finish.
  • MZ3 construction: Whitewater grade polyethylene is impact and UV resistant. 
  • Up to 25% recycled plastic
  • Storage recess for water bottle or optional pod hatch.
  • Action camera mount.
  • Durable, moulded side and end handles.
  • Four cockpit drainage vent.
  • Raised bow and tri-keel at the stern for a dry ride and directional control on a wave or choppy water.
  • Easy storage: Stackable and sized to stand vertically in the average garage.
  • Made in the UK.
  • Max paddler weight: 115-120 kg

Pyranha Surf Jet sit on top kayak Dimensions:

  • Length: L267cm  8ft 9in, W73cm 29 inches
  • Weight: 18kg, 40lbs

Pyranha Surf Jet SOT Kayak Optional Extras:

  • Deluxe padded seat with high backrest
  • Surf-Zone backstrap
  • Surf-Zone thigh control straps
  • Stern mounted portage wheel
  • Storage area bungee cord
  • Fish-on-Top kit including flush mount rod holder 
  • Paddle park
  • Pod hatch
Product Warranty: Pyranha sit on top kayaks come with a 2 year manufacturers warranty on materials and workmanship. Activate by registering your kayak within 30 days of purchase.

Option Set: Thule Veduta Caravan Awning Privacy Room
Product Description:
Thule Veduta Awning Privacy Room for Caravans 

Specially designed for the Thule Omnistor 6200/6300 fitted onto Caravans.

Overview

The Thule Veduta awning privacy room is designed to fit on any caravan which has an Omnistor 6200 or 6300 roof mounted awning which has a mounting height of 2.45m-2.59m. Available in lengths of 4m, 4.25m, 4.5m or 5m the Thule Veduta is a game changer within the Caravan awning market, allowing you to not just have a classy roof mounted cassette awning but to have a market leading privacy room to match.

Thule Veduta Features:

  • Roof, side and front sealing clamping profiles
  • Sloping front panels
  • Mosquito mesh within all panels
  • Permanent ventilation
  • Diagonal supports
  • Supplied with wind slip and wheel cover

Any returns that you have ordered incorrectly are subject to a restocking charge. For advice please call before ordering 0151 334 0222

Product Description:
Thule Omnistor 3200 Awning for Campervan, Off-Road & Compact Vehicle

Wall Mounted Roll Out Awning

The Thule Omnistor 3200 awning is perfect for your campervan or minivan. With a wall mounted installation giving you maximum headroom and space to enjoy the outdoors while remaining sheltered. Available in different sizes to suit your van perfectly, coming in sizes ranging from 1.90m to 3.00m with a canopy projection of 2.50m.

Premium pack-away awning

Suitable for campervans, minivans, compact vans and some cars with a compatible roof rack system (roof bars/cross-bars). This manual roll up box awning is super easy to set up by one person. Simply roll out the awning manually and set up the support legs. Crafted from high quality durable fabric designed for ultimate weatherproofing to protect against hard UV and the rain. Featuring an awning length of 2.50m for maximum shelter from the elements, allowing you to enjoy the outdoors whilst staying protected.

Simply open up the cassette and take out the tensions arms. Unroll canopy fabric manually and set up the support legs. The support legs and tension arms then connect to create tension and a stable awning.

Thule 3200 Awning Key Features:

  • Lightweight awning for compact vans and SUV/CUV
  • One person operation
  • Perfect stability and wind restraint
  • Fabric tensioning system with pump buckle technology
  • Easily roll open and closed manually
  • 2.50m awning projection
  • Available in Anthracite and Anodised finish

Venture Islay 14 Sit on Top Kayak
Product Description:
Venture Islay 14 Sit on Top Kayak

Venture Islay recreational SOT touring kayak

This premium sit on top is based on the Islay 14 adventure touring kayak and features the same performance characteristics in a Sit-on-Top format, adding a little more stability and accessibility. It is perfect for newcomers to the sport, anyone with accessibility concerns, or just those who prefer the openness of a sit-on-top kayak.

The Islay 14 SOT is great at enabling paddlers wanting to take their kayak that little bit further. Its large storage capacity makes it well suited for overnight adventures, as well as day trips. Its unique hull and long waterline are designed for optimum speed and tracking, while the deluxe seat and adjustable footrests will ensure your comfort on the water. 

Venture Kayaks Islay 14 can also be customised as a high performance and superbly stable fishing kayak. A large storage area at the stern is ideal for keeping bait at hand, too.

Islay 14 SOT kayak features:

  • A skeg OR a skudder (Call us to check skudder availability)
  • Skudder (skeg with a rudder's foot control capability) with Toe Pilot Footrests
  • Retractable skeg with twist lock footrests
  • Deluxe high back seat.
  • Large water resistant storage hatch with market-leading Kajaksport hatch covers.
  • Rear storage bungee cord.
  • Drinks holder.
  • Made from MZ3 polyethylene which is UV and high impact resistant. The same white water grade polyethylene used in Pyranha white water boats.

Optional Accessories:

  • Flush Mount Fishing Rod Holders
  • Centre Storage Console /Deck Pod
  • Sail Rig System (coming soon)

Islay 14 Sit on Top Dimensions:

  • Size: One Size
  • Length: 430 cm, 14 foot 1 inch
  • Width: 74 cm, 29 inches
  • Weight (MZ3): 30 kg, 66 lb
  • Max Paddler Weight: 136 kg, 300 lb

Venture Islay 14 retractable foot-operated skudder:

NOTE: The skudder version of the Islay 14 SOT are available for special order. Contact us for more info about availability on 0151 334 0222.
Product Warranty: Venture kayaks take pride in the design and quality of its kayaks and canoes, and each one is built to take you on a lifetime of adventures. This is why Venture offer a Lifetime Warranty* as standard. (* Valid to the original owner against defects in materials or workmanship for the lifetime of the product).

Product Name: JP Australia Allround Air LE 3DS Inflatable Paddleboard
Product Description:
JP Australia Allround Air LE 3DS iSUP

Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board

This all round inflatable paddleboard is ideally suited to a range of paddlers, from beginners to those taking their first white water runs, beginner surfers and yoga enthusiasts. This premium paddle board delivers fun and performance without breaking the bank. 

The AllroundAir SUP has a narrower nose to aid tracking and results in a faster glide with each paddle stroke. This makes the board perfect for distance, cruising along coastlines and exploring inlets. Its wider tail significantly improves stability and the parallel outline ensures great traction and less paddle-hand changes. The AllroundAir paddle boards are light and durable.  

JP Australia AllroundAir SUP features:

  • Padded carry handles
  • Soft grippy deck pads
  • 4 point recessed bungee storage area
  • Welded seams for added durability
  • 3D stringer increases board stiffness
  • Double layer PVC
  • Colour: grey/white/orange (new 2021 images coming soon)

AllroundAir LE 3DS paddle board comes with:

  • 1 x JP iSUP
  • 1x 9″ fin
  • 1x Repair kit
  • 1x Double Action Pump
  • 1x Light Edition Bag - designed to fit a 3 piece paddle

AllroundAir 10' 6" paddle board specification:

  • Length: 10' 6", 319cm
  • Width: 28", 81cm
  • Thickness: 6"
  • Volume: 318L 
  • LE 3DS Weight: 9.2kg, 20.3lb

Product Name: SIC Maui Tao Air Glide SUP Paddle Board Package
Product Description:
SIC Tao Air Glide Paddle Board Package

SIC Maui Inflatable SUP 

SIC paddle board's are a great choice for beginners and general leisure paddlers. This premium inflatable SUP can be inflated and deflated in minutes and can be easily folded and packed into its carry bag - ideal for storage and transportation in your car or campervan! This premium iSUP offer maximum time on the water. The SIC Tao Surf Air Glide10' 6 inflatable paddle board is ideally suited to beginners and is designed for paddlers who want a board to take out with the family, surf small waves or explore the coastline. The 11’0” and 12’6” are faster and designed more for recreational fitness and cruising. This SIC Tao Air Glide is made from the finest Drop Stitch Construction (DSC) and lightweight and durable Support Stringer Technology (SST). More durable than standard hard boards the SIC Tao inflatable boards are light, stiff, and reliable. They come packaged with a three-piece adjustable paddle so that you are ready to go out of the box.

The SIC Tao Air-Glide SUP comes with:

  • 8” Mahi fin on 10.6 and 9" Weed less fin on 11 and 12.6 boards
  • Center carry handle
  • Tethering and leash D-rings on nose and tail
  • Honeycombed EVA deck pad
  • Bungee storage tie downs 
  • Dual action pump
  • Paddle leash
  • Backpack carry case
  • Repair kit with spare fin screw and plate
  • Camera mount on nose
  • Three-piece adjustable paddle, anti-twist grip
  • SST Support stringer technology

SIC Tao Air Glide available as:

  • 11 Tao Tour

This high-quality Thule Windscreen is designed as the perfect companion to a Thule awning. The fabric used has a fine mesh, which provides a translucent screen for additional privacy while still allowing some sunlight through. The fabric acts as a strong windbreak, allowing you to relax inside your awning without strong gusts of wind disturbing you from your leisure.

Thule Windscreen Features:

Overview

This version of the Thule Omnistor 4900 is a complete Ford Transit/Tourneo Custom Kit awning, coming in a size of 2.6m for SWB vans this awning and bracket kit comes with a projection of 2m finished in the mystic grey fabric coupled with an anthracite case allowing you to fit your 4900 awning with ease even if you have a pop top roof finishing your van with a classy look.

Specific Design

Thule have designed this version of the Omnistor 4900 specifically for the Ford Transit/Tourneo Custom campervans that have a raising or pop top roof fitted. The brackets are mounted to the roof using riv-nuts along with a bonding agent. The Omnistor 4900 T5/T6 Kit provides you with everything you need to fit a cassette awning to your VW.

Sandbanks Elite 10.6 Paddle Board Package

All Round Inflatable SUP 

This highly rated Sandbanks Elite paddle board is an all round board perfect for keeping fit outdoors: cruising, flat water paddling, touring and surfing small waves. The Sandbanks Elite paddle board is lightweight and agile with great stability for riders up to 90kg. It features advanced paddleboard shaping for a longer glide time and fewer paddle strokes. The slightly upturned nose gives better performance in waves. This easy to paddle inflatable iSUP is ideal for beginners and intermediate paddlers. Sandbanks Elite paddle board is suitable for carrying passengers including kids. It is inflated and deflated in minutes giving you maximum time on the water and is ideal for storage and transportation in your car or campervan!

Outwell Woodcrest Active Awning Footprint

Double the waterproofing of your Outwell Woodcrest Active with this Double-Coated Polyethylene Footprint, featuring a 10,000 mm hydrostatic head. Banish pitching problems with the Woodcrest Active Footprint, which matches perfectly with your drive-away awning's sewn-in groundsheet, and helps you avoid wasting time in the pitching process with its included pegs, and maximises insulation for better sleep.

Woodcrest Active Ground Sheet Specifications

  • Length: 340 cm
  • Width: 210 / 310 / 240 cm (at fore / centre / aft)
  • Material: 100% Double-coated Polyethylene
Product Warranty: Outwell Woodcrest Active Awning Footprint comes with two years warranty as standard
Product Availability: Outwell Woodcrest Footprint is dispatched 1-2 working days

Product Name: Sandbanks SUP Style Wave 9' 6" iSUP Inflatable Paddle Board
Product Description:
Sandbanks Wave 9.6 Inflatable Paddle Board Package

Compact SUP for lightweight paddlers, surfers or kids

Ideally suited to smaller adults or teens the Wave stand up paddle board is agile and easy to handle in the surf. At 32" wide, the Sandbanks Wave paddle board offers fantastic stability and is still a great board for lightweight beginners (75kg and under) looking to do some general paddle boarding. This compact paddleboard weighs under 8kg and is incredibly easy to carry and being only 9'6'' long, it's also easy to manoeuvre. It is inflated and deflated in minutes giving you maximum time on the water and is ideal for storage and transportation in your car or campervan!

Sandbanks Wave inflatable paddle board is available in blue and turquoise

Sandbanks Wave SUP features:

  • Padded carry handle
  • Bungee storage area
  • Kick step to aid turns
  • Large, grippy EVA deck pad
  • 2 mini fins and 1 larger fin for straight line tracking
  • Small and agile. Ideal for lightweight riders, surfers and kids. 
  • Multi-layer fusion technology.
  • 4.75'' drop-stitch for a slimmer profile

Sandbanks Wave Paddle Board Package Includes:

  • Wave 9.6 paddle board
  • Bravo SUPer two stage pump
  • Coiled paddle board leash with safety breaker
  • Repair kit
  • Lightweight 3 piece fibreglass paddle
  • Wheelie storage bag
  • Slide and clip fin
  • 3 year manufacturer's warranty (can be extended to 5 year - enquire for details)

Sandbanks Paddle Board Specification:

  • Recommended Pressure: 18-20 PSI
  • Max Pressure: 25 PSI
  • Length: 9'6''
  • Width: 32''
  • Thickness: 4.75''
  • Volume: 221L
  • Weight: 8kg
Product Warranty: Sandbanks Wave SUP, inflatable paddle board, comes with a 5 year manufacturers warranty.
Product Availability: Sandbanks Wave paddle board is sent via next working day delivery

Product Name: Victron Energy Phoenix Inverter Compact 12V 1200VA 1600VA and 2000VA VE.Bus
Product Description:
Victron Energy Phoenix Inverter Compact 12/2000 VE.Bus

Developed for professional duty and suitable for a wide range of appliances.

Extra Start Up Power

Using SinusMax technology, the Victron Phoenix Inverter Compact has very high start-up power which offers extreme performance meaning that it is well suited to powering what would normally be a difficult load such as fridge compressors and similar electric motors.

Parallel & 3-Phase Operation

The Victron Phoenix Inverter Compact allows you to operate in parallel therefore achieving higher power outputs. Operation within 3-phase configuration is also possible.

 

Multi-Load Functionality

Remote Monitoring

The Victron Energy Phoenix Inverter Compact VE.Bus has built-in Bluetooth and can be controlled and checked on a smartphone, tablet or laptop.

All settings of the Phoenix Inverter can be configured with the VictronConnect app.

The Victron Energy Phoenix Pure Sinewave Inverter is a fully configurable system which can be linked to multiple devices and monitored through several different interfaces
Product Availability: The Victron Phoenix Inverter is sent on a 1-3 working day delivery
